S04bsu034_u:423_1: devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūrvaparikarmakṛtāyā anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /

S04bsu034_u:517_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhiṃ

S04bsu034_u:517_3: sarvaṃ ca me vacanaṃ buddhaparigṛhītaṃ niścaritumiti,
S04bsu034_u:518_0: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmarthāya ayaṃ samādhirudgrahītavyaḥ
S04bsu034_u:518_1: paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyaḥ
S04bsu034_u:518_2: araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:519: katame ca te kumāra tathāgatasya bhūtā buddhaguṇāḥ?

S04bsu034_u:520_1: vā śūnyāgāramadhyagato vā evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate - evaṃ sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan
S04bsu034_u:520_3: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /

S04bsu034_u:560: bhūtaṃ buddhaguṇavarṇaṃ saṃprakḥśayan no cḥrthato no vyañjanataśca paryḥdḥnaṃ gacchati /

S04bsu034_u:577: SRS_3.7 eta guṇa samudānituṃ mi pūrvā vana varu sevita nityamalpaśabdam /
S04bsu034_u:578: kṛpabahulu bhavāmi nityakālaṃ sada mama cittu labheya buddhajñānam //
S04bsu034_u:579: na ca mama kvacidāgraho abhūṣi priyataravastuna ātmano 'pi bhoktum /
S04bsu034_u:580: SRS_3.8 na ca mama kvacidāgraho abhūṣi priyataravastuna ātmano 'pi bhoktum /
S04bsu034_u:582: dadami ahu prabhūta deyadharmaṃ sada mama cittu labheya buddhajñānam //

S04bsu034_u:593: SRS_3.14 yāvat pṛthu kecidasti puṣpā tathariva gandha manoramā udārāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:595: SRS_3.15 yāvat pṛthu kecidasti vādyā tatha bahu bhojana annapānavastrāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:599: SRS_3.17 yāvata pṛthu gaṅgavālikāḥ syustāvata kalpa bhaṇeya ānuśaṃsā /

S04bsu034_u:601: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattven mahāsattvena udgrahītavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ paryavāptavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:602: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya araṇābhāvanāyogamanuyuktena ca bhavitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:603: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S04bsu034_u:604: atha khalu bhagavāstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -

S04bsu034_u:615: SRS_3.23 prajñāya varṇaṃ vakṣyanti prajñāya ca anarthikāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:617: SRS_3.24 candanasya yathā kaścid bhāṣate puruṣo guṇān /
S04bsu034_u:619: SRS_3.25 athānyaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛccheta taṃ naram /
S04bsu034_u:620: gṛhīta candanaṃ kiṃcid yasya vaṇa prabhāṣase //
S04bsu034_u:621: SRS_3.26 sa naraṃ taṃ pratibrūyād gandhavarṇaṃ bravīmyaham /
S04bsu034_u:622: jīvikāṃ yena kalpemi taṃ ca gandhaṃ na vedmyaham //
S04bsu034_u:624: paścime bheṣyate kāle śīlaṃ caiṣāṃ na bheṣyate //
S04bsu034_u:626: paścime bheṣyate kāle samādhiścaiṣāṃ na bheṣyate //
S04bsu034_u:628: bheṣyate paścime kāle prajñā caiṣāṃ na bheṣyate //
S04bsu034_u:630: bheṣyate paścime kāle vimuktiścaiṣāṃ na bheṣyate //
S04bsu034_u:631: SRS_3.31 yatha puruṣu daridru kaścideva sace paribhūtu bhavenmahājanasya /
S04bsu034_u:632: sa ca labhati nidhānu paścakāle dhanapati bhūtva janāna satkareyyā //
S04bsu034_u:633: SRS_3.32 evamimu na samādhi yāva labdho na ca bahumato bhavatīha bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:634: marumanujakumbhāṇḍarākṣasā no yatha puruṣu daridru arthahīnaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:635: SRS_3.33 yada punariya labdha bhoti bhūmī atuliyu dharmanidhānu paṇḍitena /
S04bsu034_u:636: maru manuja spṛhaṃ janenti tatra sa ca dhanu deti niruttaraṃ prajānām //
S04bsu034_u:637: SRS_3.34 tasma imi śruṇitva ānuśaṃsāṃ paramapraṇītayaḥ kīrtitā jinena /
S04bsu034_u:638: sarva jahiya jñātralābhasaukhyamimu varamuddiśathā samādhi śāntam //
S04bsu034_u:639: SRS_3.35 ye keci buddhā diśatā sunirvṛtā anāgatā ye 'pi ca pratyutpannāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:640: sarve ca śikṣitva iha samādhau bodhiṃ vibuddhā atulāmacintiyām //
S04bsu034_u:641: SRS_3.36 candraprabhaḥ kumāru hṛṣṭacittaḥ puratu jinasya sthihitva vāca bhāṣī /
S04bsu034_u:642: ahu puruṣavarasya nirvṛtasya sukisari kāli idaṃ dhariṣye sūtram //
S04bsu034_u:643: SRS_3.37 kāya ahu tyajitva jīvitaṃ ca tathapi ca saukhya yadasti loke /
S04bsu034_u:644: tatra ahu mahābhaye 'pi kāle imu varu śānta samādhi dhārayiṣye //
S04bsu034_u:645: SRS_3.38 mahakaruṇa janitva sattvakāye sudukhita sattva anātha prāpta dṛṣṭvā /
S04bsu034_u:646: teṣvahamupasaṃharitva maitrīmimu vara śānta samādhi deśayiṣye //
S04bsu034_u:647: SRS_3.39 pañcaśata anūna tasmin kāle ya utthita tatra samādhidhārakāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:648: pūrvaṃgama kumāra teṣa āsīdiha varasūtraparigrahe udāre //
S04bsu034_u:652: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - samādhiḥ samādhiriti bhagavannucyate /
S04bsu034_u:654: evamukte bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - samādhiḥ samādhiriti kumāra ucyate yaduta cittanidhyāptiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:697: sarvajñajñāne tīvracchandatā samādhiḥ samādhiriti kumāra ucyate /
S04bsu034_u:698: yā eveṣvevaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu pratipattirapratipattiḥ, ayaṃ sa kumāra ucyate samādhiriti //
S04bsu034_u:699: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:700: SRS_4.1 apāvṛtaṃ me amṛtasya dvāram ācakṣito dharmasvabhāvu yādṛśaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:701: nidarśitā me upapatti yādṛśī prakāśitā nirvṛti sānuśaṃsā //
S04bsu034_u:702: SRS_4.2 vivarjanīyāḥ sada pāpamitrāḥ kalyāṇamitrāśca niṣevitavyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:703: vaneṣu vastavya gaṇān jahitvā maitraṃ ca cittaṃ sada bhāvanīyam //
S04bsu034_u:704: SRS_4.3 śuddhaṃ ca śīlaṃ sada rakṣitavyaṃ dhūteṣu puṣṭiḥ sada vinditavyā /
S04bsu034_u:705: tyāgaśca prajñā ca niṣevitavyā / na durlabho eṣa samādhi bheṣyati //
S04bsu034_u:706: SRS_4.4 tato labhitvā ima śāntabhūmi yasyāmabhūmiḥ pṛthu śrāvakāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:708: SRS_4.5 dṛṣṭvā narān bhājanabuddhimantān tān bodhicittasmi samādahetha /
S04bsu034_u:709: anuttare jñāni pratiṣṭhapitvā na durlabho eṣa samādhirājaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:710: SRS_4.6 yasyārthi īrṣā puna saṃjaneyyā āhāri niṣyandiha pratyavekṣataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:711: paryeṣṭitaśco paribhogataśca na durlabho eṣa samādhi bheṣyate //
S04bsu034_u:712: SRS_4.7 samādhirājo yadi vaiṣa śūnyato viśuddhaśīlānayu mūrdhni tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu034_u:713: svabhāvato dharma sadā samāhitā bālā na jānanti ayuktayogāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:714: SRS_4.8 yeṣāmayaṃ śānta samādhiriṣṭo na teṣa jātu bhayabuddhi tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu034_u:716: SRS_4.9 ākārato yaḥ smarate tathāgatān sa bhoti śāntendriyu śāntamānasaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:717: abhrāntacittaḥ satataṃ samāhitaḥ śrutena jñānena ca sāgaropamaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:718: SRS_4.10 asmin samādhau hi pratiṣṭhihittvā yaścaṃkrame caṃkrami bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:720: unmādu gaccheya narasya cittaṃ yo buddhadharmāṇa pramāṇu gṛhṇīyāt /
S04bsu034_u:721: SRS_4.11 unmādu gaccheya narasya cittaṃ yo buddhadharmāṇa pramāṇu gṛhṇīyāt /
S04bsu034_u:724: SRS_4.12 na so 'sti sattvo daśasu diśāsu yo lokanāthena samaḥ kutottari /
S04bsu034_u:727: yasyātra ālambani cittu vartate samāhitaḥ socyati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:728: SRS_4.14 asaṃskṛtaṃ saṃskṛtu jñātva vijño nimittasaṃjñāya vibhāvitāya /
S04bsu034_u:729: so ānimitte bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ prajānatī śūnyaka sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:730: SRS_4.15 yo dharmakāye bhavati pratiṣṭhito abhāva jānāti sa sarvabhāvān /
S04bsu034_u:731: abhāvasaṃjñāya vibhāvitāya na rūpakāyena jinendra paśyati //
S04bsu034_u:732: SRS_4.16 ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahu ca vitarkayennaraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:733: tathā tathā bhavati tannimittacittastehi vitarkehi tanniśritehi //
S04bsu034_u:734: SRS_4.17 evaṃ munīndraṃ smarato narasya ākārato jñānato aprameyataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:735: anusmṛtiṃ bhāvayataḥ sadā ca tannimnacittaṃ bhavatī tatproṇam //
S04bsu034_u:736: SRS_4.18 sa caṃkramastho na niṣadyamāśrita ākāṅkṣate puruṣavarasya jñānam /
S04bsu034_u:737: ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ praṇigheti bodhaye bhaviṣyahaṃ loki niruttaro jinaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:738: SRS_4.19 sa buddha saṃjānati buddha paśyate buddhāna co dharmata pratyavekṣate /
S04bsu034_u:739: iha samādhismi pratiṣṭhihitvā namasyate buddha mahānubhāvān //
S04bsu034_u:740: SRS_4.20 kāyena vācā ca prasanna mānasā buddhāna varṇaṃ bhaṇatī abhīkṣṇam /
S04bsu034_u:741: tathāhi so bhāvitacittasaṃtatī / rātriṃdivaṃ paśyati lokanāthān //
S04bsu034_u:742: SRS_4.21 yadāpi so bhoti gilāna āturaḥ pravartate vedana māraṇāntikā /
S04bsu034_u:743: na buddhamārabhya smṛtiḥ pramuṣyate na vedanābhiranusaṃharīyati //
S04bsu034_u:744: SRS_4.22 tathā hi tena vicinitva jñātā anāgatā āgata dharmaśūnyatā /
S04bsu034_u:745: so tādṛśe dharmanaye pratiṣṭhito na khidyate citta carantu cārikām //
S04bsu034_u:746: SRS_4.23 tasmācchruṇitvā imu ānuśaṃsā janetha chandamatulāya bodhaye /
S04bsu034_u:747: mā paścakāle paritāpu bheṣyata sudurlabhaṃ sugatavarāṇa darśanam //
S04bsu034_u:748: SRS_4.24 ahaṃ ca bhāṣeya praṇīta dharmaṃ yūyaṃ ca śrutvāna samācarethāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:749: bhaiṣajya vastrāṃ ca gṛhītva āturo 'panetu vyādhiṃ na prabhoti ātmanaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:750: SRS_4.25 tasmādvidhijñena vicakṣaṇena imaṃ samādhiṃ pratikāṅkṣatā sadā /
S04bsu034_u:751: śīlaṃ śrutaṃ tyāgu niṣevitavyaṃ na durlabho eṣa samādhi bheṣyati //
S04bsu034_u:755_0: tatra bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra atīte
S04bsu034_u:755_2: tena kālena tena samayena bhagavān ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S04bsu034_u:755_3: loke udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S04bsu034_u:755_4: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu034_u:756: tena kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aśītiḥ śrāvakakoṭyaḥ prathamasannipāto 'bhūt sarveṣāmarhatām /
S04bsu034_u:759: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasya bhagavato ghoṣadattasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇamabhūt /
S04bsu034_u:760: ayaṃ ca jambudvīpa ṛddhaḥ sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca ramaṇīyaśca bahujanākīrṇamanuṣyaścābhūt /
S04bsu034_u:761: tena khalu punaḥ samayena asmin jambudvīpe dvau rājānāvabhūtām /
S04bsu034_u:764: dvitīyo 'pyardhaṃ paribhuṅkte ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca bahujanākīrṇamanuṣyaṃ ca //
S04bsu034_u:765: tena kālena tena samayena rājño mahābalasya vijite bhagavān ghoṣadattastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:766_0: iti hi kumāra rājñā mahābalena sa ghoṣadattastathāgataḥ paripūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ
S04bsu034_u:766_1: nimantrito 'bhūt sārdhaṃ bodhisattvasaṃghena bhikṣusaṃghena ca kalpikena paribhogeṇānavadyena
S04bsu034_u:767: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvasaṃghasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya cotsado lābhasatkāraśloko 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:768: śrāddhāśca brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sabodhisattvasaṃghasya cotsadaṃ lābhasatkāramakārṣuḥ /
S04bsu034_u:769_0: te ca śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
S04bsu034_u:769_1: lābhasatkārāyodyuktā abhūvan lokāmiṣapūjāyai yaduta rājña eva ca mahābalasyānuśikṣamāṇarūpam / iti hi
S04bsu034_u:770_0: kumāra tasya bhagavato ghoṣadattasya etadabhūt - parihīyante bateme sattvāḥ śīlapoṣadhasamādānatastathāgatānāmupasaṃkramaṇatastathāgataparyupāsanato
S04bsu034_u:772: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tadanantaraṃ sukhamidaṃ yaduta lokāmiṣapūjā /
S04bsu034_u:773: ta ete satvā dṛṣṭadharmagurukāśca saṃparāyagurukāśca nātyantaniṣṭhāḥ kuśalamūlāya /
S04bsu034_u:774: tatreyaṃ kumāra katamā duṣṭadharmagurukatā? yaduta pañcakāmaguṇābhiprāyatā /
S04bsu034_u:775: [Vaidya_24] tatra kumāra katamā sāṃparāyikagurukatā? yaduta svargalokādhyālambanatā /
S04bsu034_u:783: yannavahameteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā tathā dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yadamī sattvā yathānuttarayā dharmapūjayā dharmapratipattyā ca tathāgataṃ pūjayeyuḥ //
S04bsu034_u:784: atha khalu kumāra ghoṣadattastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ velāyāṃ rājño mahābalasya teṣāṃ ca brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ saṃvejanābhiprāya imā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:785: SRS_5.1 dānapradānena anyonya sevatāṃ teṣānyamanyasmi na bhoti gauravam /
S04bsu034_u:786: nā tādṛśīṃ sevana varṇayanti buddhā vidū yeṣa prahīṇa vāsanā //
S04bsu034_u:787: SRS_5.2 te tādṛśā bhonti narāḥ susevitā ye dharma deśenti hitāya prāṇinām /
S04bsu034_u:789: SRS_5.3 lokāmiṣeṇo nara sevatāṃ nṛṇāṃ sarveṣaṃ sāṃdṛṣṭika bhoti arthaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:790: nirāmiṣaṃ dharma niṣevatāṃ hi mahānta artho bhavatī narāṇām //
S04bsu034_u:791: SRS_5.4 nirāmiṣaṃ cittu upasthapitvā nirāmiṣaṃ dharma prakāśayitvā /
S04bsu034_u:792: nirāmiṣaṃ yeṣa bhaveta prema te tādṛśāḥ kṣipra bhavanti buddhāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:793: SRS_5.5 na jātu kāmān pratisevamānaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇām /
S04bsu034_u:794: gṛhaṃ ca sevantu jugupsanīyamanuttarāṃ prāpsyati so 'grabodhim //
S04bsu034_u:795: ye kāma varjenti yathāgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu jahitva tṛṣṇām /
S04bsu034_u:796: SRS_5.6 ye kāma varjenti yathāgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu jahitva tṛṣṇām /
S04bsu034_u:799: SRS_5.7 na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇa āsī anāgate bheṣyati vāvatiṣṭhate /
S04bsu034_u:801: SRS_5.8 prahāya rājyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vaseta raṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:802: kleśān prahāya pratihatya māraṃ buddhyanti bodhiṃ virajāmasaṃskṛtām //
S04bsu034_u:803: SRS_5.9 yo buddhavīrān yatha gaṅgavālukā upasthiheyyā bahukalpakoṭiyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:804: yaśco gṛhātaḥ parikhinnamānaso 'bhiniṣkrameyyā ayu tatra uttamaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:805: SRS_5.10 annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi /
S04bsu034_u:806: nopasthitā bhonti narottamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā cariyāṇa dharmam //
S04bsu034_u:807: SRS_5.11 yaścaiva bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ sattvārtha nirviṇṇu kusaṃskṛtātaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:808: raṇyāmukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrame ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti //
S04bsu034_u:809: aśrauṣīt khalu punaḥ kumāra rājā mahābalo bhagavatā ghoṣadattena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena imāmevaṃrūpāṃ pravartitāṃ naiṣkramyapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathām /
S04bsu034_u:810: śrutvā ca vimṛśati - yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S04bsu034_u:820: yannvahaṃ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajeyam /
S04bsu034_u:821_0: iti hi [Vaidya_26] kumāra rājā mahābalaḥ sārdhamaśītyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśatasahasraiḥ
S04bsu034_u:821_1: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bhagavān ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu034_u:822: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'sthāt /
S04bsu034_u:823: atha khalu kumāra bhagavān ghoṣadatto rājño mahābalasya adhyāśayaṃ viditvā imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ deśayate /
S04bsu034_u:824: atha khalu kumāra rājā mahābala imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ keśaśmaśraṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajito 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:826: udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayiotvā bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt /
S04bsu034_u:827: sa tenaiva kuśalamūlena daśakalpakoṭyo na jātu durgativinipātamagamat,
S04bsu034_u:830: śrutvā tebhyo buddhebhyastenodgṛhītaḥ paryavāpto dhārito vācito bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt /
S04bsu034_u:831: sa tataḥ paścāt tenaiva kuśalamūlena daśānāṃ kalpakoṭīnāmatyayena paripūrṇena kalpaśatasahasreṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:832: so 'prameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā paścād buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvṛto 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:833: tatra kumāra yānyaśītiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇi rājñā mahābalena sārdhaṃ bhagavantaṃ ghoṣadattaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkrāntāni,
S04bsu034_u:836: prītisaumanasyajātāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitā abhūvan /
S04bsu034_u:837: te 'pi tathā pravrajitā imaṃ samādhimudgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyuktā vihṛtya tenaiva kuśalamūlena viṃśatikalpakoṭyo na jātu durgativinipātamagaman /
S04bsu034_u:839_0: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantike imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvodgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā
S04bsu034_u:839_1: vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyuktā vihṛtya tenaiva pūrvakreṇa kuśalamūlena viṃśatīnāṃ
S04bsu034_u:839_2: kalpakoṭīnāmatyayena tataḥ paścāt paripūrṇadaśabhiḥ kalpasahasrairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā
S04bsu034_u:839_3: dṛḍhaśūranāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpannā abhuvan /
S04bsu034_u:840: te 'pyaprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān paripācya teṣāṃ cārthaṃ kṛtvā buddhaparinirvṛtā abhūvan /
S04bsu034_u:841: tadanenāpi te kumāra paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ yathāyaṃ samādhirbahukaro bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarasya sarvajñajñānasyāharaṇāya saṃvartata iti //
S04bsu034_u:842: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya tasyāṃ velāyāmetadeva pūrvayogaparivartaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -
S04bsu034_u:843: smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatītamadhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇa uttamaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:844: SRS_5.12 smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatītamadhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇa uttamaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:846: utpannu lokārthakaro maharṣi nāmena so ucyati ghoṣadattaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:847: SRS_5.13 aśīti koṭyaḥ paripūrṇa tasya prathamo gaṇo āsi ya śrāvakāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:848: dvitīya cāsīt paripūrṇa saptatistṛtīya co ṣaṣṭyarahantakoṭiyaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:849: SRS_5.14 sarve ca kṣīṇāsrava niṣkileśāḥ sarve ca ṛddhībalapāramiṃ gatāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:850: varṣaṃ sahasrā duvi viśaṃ cāyuḥ kṣetraṃ ca āsīt pariśuddha śobhanam //
S04bsu034_u:851: SRS_5.15 abhiṣekaprāptā parahita aprameyā vaśitehi bhūmihi ca supratiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:852: āsanna te drumavari bodhi bodhituṃ ye bodhisatvāsta abhūṣi tāyinaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:853: SRS_5.16 iha jambudvīpasmi abhūṣi rājā dṛḍhabalo nāma mahābalaśca /
S04bsu034_u:854: upārdhu rājyasya tadeku bhuñjate dvitīya cādhasya abhūṣi rājā //
S04bsu034_u:855: SRS_5.17 mahābalasyo vijitasmi buddho utpanna so devamanuṣyapūjitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:856: labhitva rājā sugatasmi śraddhām upasthihī varṣasahasra pūrṇam //
S04bsu034_u:857: SRS_5.18 tasyānuśikṣī bahu anyasattvāḥ kurvanti satkāra tathāgatasya /
S04bsu034_u:858: lokāmiṣeṇaiva hi dharmapūjayā saśrāvakasya atulo 'bhū utsadaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:859: SRS_5.19 abhūṣi cittaṃ puruṣottamasya deśiṣya dharmamimi dharmakāmāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:860: yannūna sarve prajahitva kāmāniha pravrajeyurmama śāsanasmin //
S04bsu034_u:861: SRS_5.20 sa bhāṣate gātha narāṇamuttamaḥ saṃlekhidharmaṃ sugatāna śikṣām /
S04bsu034_u:863: SRS_5.21 śruṇitva gāthāṃ tada rājapārthivo eko vicinteti rahogato nṛpaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:864: na śakya gehasmi sthihitva sarve pratipadyitumuttadharmapūjā //
S04bsu034_u:865: SRS_5.22 sa rājya tyaktvā yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ prāṇisahasrebhiraśītibhiḥ saha /
S04bsu034_u:866: upasaṃkramī tasya jinasya antikaṃ vanditva pādau purataḥ sthito 'bhūt //
S04bsu034_u:867: SRS_5.23 teṣāṃ jino āśayu jānamāno deśetimaṃ śānta samādhi durdṛśam /
S04bsu034_u:869: SRS_5.24 te pravrajitvāna imaṃ samādhiṃ dhāritva vācitva paryāpuṇitva /
S04bsu034_u:870: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ kalpāna koṭyaḥ paripūrṇa viṃśatim //
S04bsu034_u:871: SRS_5.25 te tena sarve kuśalena karmaṇā adrākṣu buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:872: sarveṣu co teṣu jinānuśāsane te pravrajitvemu samādhi bhāvayī //
S04bsu034_u:873: SRS_5.26 te paścime kāli abhūṣi buddhā dṛḍhaśūranāmāna anantavīryāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:874: kṛtvā ca arthaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ te paścikālesmi śikhīva nirvṛtāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:875: SRS_5.27 mahābalo rājā ya āsi pūrvaṃ sa jñānaśūro abhu buddha loke /
S04bsu034_u:876: tadā bahu prāṇisahasrakoṭiyaḥ sthapetva bodhāya sa paści nirvṛtaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:877: SRS_5.28 tasmācchruṇitvā imu paścikāle dhāreya sūtramimu buddhavarṇitam /
S04bsu034_u:882_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra
S04bsu034_u:882_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena imaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
S04bsu034_u:884: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahākaruṇāsaṃprasthitena cittena tiṣṭhatāṃ vā tathāgatānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ vā pūjākarmaṇe udyukto bhavati,
S04bsu034_u:886: sa na kaṃciddharmamākāṅkṣaṃstathāgataṃ pūjayati na rūpaṃ na kāmān na bhogān na svargān na parivārān /
S04bsu034_u:888: sa ākāṅkṣan dharmakāyato 'pi tathāgataṃ nopalabhate, kimaṅga punā rūpakāyata upalapsyate /
S04bsu034_u:889: tasmāttarhi kumāra eṣāṃ sā tathāgatānā pūjā yaduta tathāgatasyādarśanamātmanaścānupalabdhiḥ karmavipākasya cāpratikāṅkṣamāṇatā /
S04bsu034_u:890: anayā kumāra trimaṇḍalapariśuddhayā pūjayā tathāgataṃ pūjayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate //
S04bsu034_u:891: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya etadeva samādhiparikarmanirdeśaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśamati sma -
S04bsu034_u:892: SRS_6.1 anantajñānasya daditva gandhān anantagandho bhavatī narāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:893: na kalpakoṭīya vrajanti durgatiṃ durgandhiyaṃ teṣu na jātu bhoti //
S04bsu034_u:894: SRS_6.2 te kalpakoṭyaścaramāṇu cārikāṃ pūjitva buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:895: te jñānagandhena samudgatena bhavanti buddhā varaśīlagandhikāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:896: SRS_6.3 sacet punarjānati vāsti sattvo yo gandha detī tatha yasya dīyate /
S04bsu034_u:897: etena cittena dadāti gandhameṣāsya kṣāntirmṛdu ānulomikī //
S04bsu034_u:898: SRS_6.4 tasyaitaṃ kṣāntimadhimātra sevataḥ sacennaraḥ kākaṇicchedyu chidyate /
S04bsu034_u:899: kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikā na tasya cittaṃ bhavati vivartiyam //
S04bsu034_u:900: SRS_6.5 kiṃ kāraṇaṃ vucyati kṣānti nāma kathaṃ puno vucyati ānulomikī /
S04bsu034_u:901: avivartiko vucyati kena hetunā kathaṃ puno vucyati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:902: SRS_6.6 kṣāntyasmi dharme prakṛtau nirātmake nairātmyasaṃjñasya kileśu nāsti /
S04bsu034_u:903: khaṃ yādṛśaṃ jānati sarvadharmāstasmādiha syā kva tu kṣānti nāma //
S04bsu034_u:904: SRS_6.7 ānulomi sarveṣa jināna śikṣato na cāsti dharmaścarate vicakṣaṇaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:905: na buddhadharmeṣu janeti saṃśayāniyaṃ sa kṣāntirbhavatānulomikī //
S04bsu034_u:906: SRS_6.8 evaṃ carantasya ya loki mārāste buddharūpeṇa bhaṇeyya vācā /
S04bsu034_u:907: sudurlabhā bodhi bhavāhi śrāvakā na gṛhṇotī vākyu na co vivartate //
S04bsu034_u:908: SRS_6.9 bodheti sattvān viṣamātu dṛṣṭito na eṣa mārgo amṛtasya prāptaye /
S04bsu034_u:909: kumārga varṇitva pathe sthapeti taṃ kāraṇamucyati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:911: svapnāntare 'pyasya na jātu bhoti asti naro pudgala jīva sattvaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:912: SRS_6.11 sace mārakoṭyo yatha gaṅgavālukāste buddharūpeṇa upāgamitvā /
S04bsu034_u:913: bhaṇeyurabhyantarakāyu jīvo te maṃ vade nāsti na yūya buddhā //
S04bsu034_u:914: SRS_6.12 jñānena jānāmyahu skandhaśūnyakaṃ jñātvā ca kleśehi na saṃvasāmi /
S04bsu034_u:915: vyāhāramātreṇa ca vyoharāmi parinirvṛto lokamimaṃ carāmi //
S04bsu034_u:916: SRS_6.13 yathā hi putra puruṣasya jātu kṛtaṃsi nāmā ayameva nāma /
S04bsu034_u:917: nāmaṃ na tasyo diśatā sulabhyate tathāsya nāmaṃ na kutaścidāgatam //
S04bsu034_u:918: SRS_6.14 tathaiva nāmaṃ kṛtu bodhisattvo na cāsya nāmaṃ diśatā sulabhyate /
S04bsu034_u:919: paryeṣamāṇo ayu bodhisattvo jānāti yo eṣa sa bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:920: SRS_6.15 samudramadhye 'pi jvaleta agni rna bodhisattvasya satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:921: yato 'sya bodhāya utpannu cittamatrāntare tasya na jīvadṛṣṭiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:922: SRS_6.16 na hyatra jāto na mṛto ca kaścidutpanna sattvo manujo naro vā /
S04bsu034_u:923: māyopamā dharma svabhāvaśūnyā na śakyate jānitu tīrthikehi //
S04bsu034_u:924: SRS_6.17 na cāpi āhāravimūrchitehi lubdhehi gṛddhehi ca pātracīvare /
S04bsu034_u:925: na coddhatehi napi connatehi śakyā iyaṃ jānitu buddhabodhiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:926: SRS_6.18 na styānamiddhābhihataiḥ kusīdaiḥ stabdhehi mānīhi anātrapehi /
S04bsu034_u:927: yeṣāṃ na buddhasmi prasādu asti na śakyate hī varabodhi jānitum //
S04bsu034_u:928: SRS_6.19 na bhinnavṛttehi pṛthagjanehi yeṣāṃ na dharmasmi prasādu asti /
S04bsu034_u:929: sabrahmacārīṣu ca nāsti gauravaṃ na śakyate hī varabodhi buddhitum //
S04bsu034_u:930: SRS_6.20 abhinnavṛttā hirimanta lajjino yeṣāṃ sti buddhe api dharme prema /
S04bsu034_u:931: sabrahmacārīṣu ca tīvragauravaṃ te prāpuṇantī varabodhimuttamām //
S04bsu034_u:932: SRS_6.21 smṛterupasthāna iha yeṣa gocaraḥ prāmodya prīti śayanamupastṛtam /
S04bsu034_u:933: dhyānāni cāhāru samādhi pāniyaṃ budhyanti te 'pi varabodhimuttamām //
S04bsu034_u:935: bodhyaṅgapuṣpā surabhī manoramā te yujyamānā varabodhi prāpayī //
S04bsu034_u:936: SRS_6.23 yā bodhisattvāna carī vidūnāmabhūmiranyasya janasya tatra /
S04bsu034_u:937: pratyekabuddhāna ca śrāvakāṇa ca ko vātra vijño na janeya chandam //
S04bsu034_u:938: SRS_6.24 sacenmamā āyu bhaveta ettakaṃ kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālukāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:939: ekasya romasya bhaṇeya varṇaṃ bauddhena jñānena paryantu nāsti //
S04bsu034_u:940: SRS_6.25 tasmācchuṇitvā imu ānuśaṃsāmanābhibhūtena jinena deśitām /
S04bsu034_u:941: imaṃ samādhiṃ laghu uddiśeyā na durlabhā bheṣyati agrabodhiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:945_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmātarhi kumāra
S04bsu034_u:945_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
S04bsu034_u:951: tathāhi kumāra yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvastrikṣāntiviśeṣakuśalo bhavati trikṣāntijñānaviśeṣakuśalaśca bhavati,
S04bsu034_u:952: tadāyaṃ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate,
S04bsu034_u:954: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmenāyaṃ trikṣāntyavatāro dharmaparyāya udgrahītavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:956: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ceti //
S04bsu034_u:957: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasyemaṃ trikṣāntyavatāraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -
S04bsu034_u:958: SRS_7.1 na kenacit sārdhaṃ karoti vigrahaṃ na bhāṣate vācamanarthasaṃhitām /
S04bsu034_u:959: arthe ca dharme ca sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ prathamāya kṣāntīya sada nirdiśīyati //
S04bsu034_u:960: SRS_7.2 māyopamān jānati sarvadharmān na cāpi so bhoti nimittagocaraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:961: na hīyate jñānavivṛddhabhūmeḥ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:963: anantajñānī sugatāna jñāne prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:964: SRS_7.4 yaḥ kaści dharmaṃ śṛṇute subhāṣitaṃ buddhāna co bhāṣita tanna kāṅkṣati /
S04bsu034_u:965: adhimucyate sarvajināna dharmatāṃ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:966: SRS_7.5 nītārthasūtrāntaviśeṣa jānati yathopadiṣṭā sugatena śūnyatā /
S04bsu034_u:967: yāsmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthatāṃ jānati sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:968: SRS_7.6 ye asmi loke pṛthu anyatīrthā na tasya teṣu pratihanyate manaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:969: kāruṇyameteṣu upasthapeti prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:970: SRS_7.7 ābhāsamāgacchati tasya dhāraṇī tasmiṃśca ābhāsi na jātu kāṅkṣati /
S04bsu034_u:971: satyānuparivartini vāca bhāṣate prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:972: SRS_7.8 caturṇa dhātūna siyānyathātvaṃ vāyvambutejaḥpṛthivīya cāpi /
S04bsu034_u:973: na co vivarteta sa buddhabodheḥ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:974: SRS_7.9 ye śilpasthānā pṛthu asti loke sarveṣu so śikṣitu bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:975: na cātmana uttari kiṃci paśyati prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:976: SRS_7.10 akampiyaḥ samathabalena bhoti śelopamo bhoti vipaśyanāya /
S04bsu034_u:977: na kṣobhituṃ śakyu sa sarvasattvairdvitīyāya kṣāntīya sa nirdiśīyati //
S04bsu034_u:978: SRS_7.11 samāhitastiṣṭhati bhāṣate ca samāhitaścaṃkramate niṣīdati /
S04bsu034_u:979: samādhiye pāramitāgato vidu dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:980: SRS_7.12 samāhito labhati abhijña pañca kṣetraśataṃ gacchati dharmadeśakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:981: no cāpi so ṛddhibalāttu hīyate dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:982: SRS_7.13 sa tādṛśaṃ śānta samādhimeṣate samāhitasya na sa asti sattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:983: yastasya cittasya pramāṇu gṛhṇīyā dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:984: SRS_7.14 ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste buddhajñānena bhaṇeyu dharmān /
S04bsu034_u:985: udgṛhṇato sarva yato hi bhāṣiutaṃ dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:986: SRS_7.15 purimottarā dakṣiṇapaścimāsu heṣṭhe tathordhvaṃ vidiśāsu caiva /
S04bsu034_u:987: sarvatra so paśyati lokanāthān tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya sa nirdiśīyati //
S04bsu034_u:988: SRS_7.16 suvarṇavarṇena samucchrayeṇa acintiyāṃ nirmita nirmiṇitvā /
S04bsu034_u:989: deśeti dharmaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:990: SRS_7.17 ya jambudvīpa iha buddhakṣetre sarvatra so dṛśyati bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:991: jñātaśca bhotī sasurāsure jage tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:992: SRS_7.18 buddhāna ācāru tathaiva gocarā īryāpatho yādṛśa nāyakānām /
S04bsu034_u:993: sarvatra so śikṣitu bhoti paṇḍitastṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:994: ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyu varṇam /
S04bsu034_u:995: SRS_7.19 ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyu varṇam /

S04bsu034_u:1041_0: tatra punarapi bhagavān candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra
S04bsu034_u:1042_0: tena kālena tena samayena abhāvasamudgato nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke
S04bsu034_u:1042_1: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ
S04bsu034_u:1043: tat kiṃ manyase kumāra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'bhāvasamudgata ityucyate?
S04bsu034_u:1044_0: sa khalu punaḥ kumāra tathāgato jātamātra evoparyantarīkṣe saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgamya
S04bsu034_u:1044_1: sapta padāni prakramitvā imāmevaṃrūpāṃ vācamabhāṣata - abhāvasamudgatāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S04bsu034_u:1046: tena ca kumāra śabdena trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ svareṇābhivijñapto 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:1047: tatra bhaumān devānupādāya yāvad brahmalokaṃ paraṃparayā śabdamudīrayāmāsuḥ ghoṣamanuśrāvayāmāsuḥ - abhāvasamudgato batāyaṃ tathāgato bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu034_u:1048: yo jātamātra evoparyantarīkṣe saptatālamātramabhyudgamya sapta padāni prakramitvā abhāvaśabdamudīrayati /
S04bsu034_u:1049: iti hyabhāvasamudgato 'bhāvasamudgata iti tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyamudapādi /
S04bsu034_u:1050: tasya ca bhagavato bodhiprāptasya sarvavṛkṣapatrebhyaḥ sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatibhyaḥ sarvaśailaśikharebhyaścābhāvasamudgataśabdo niścarati /
S04bsu034_u:1051: yāvati ca tatra lokadhātau śabdaprajñaptiḥ sarvato 'bhāvasamudgatavijñaptiśabdo niścarati /
S04bsu034_u:1052_0: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato 'bhāvasamudgatasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu034_u:1052_1: samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane mahākaruṇācintī nāma rājakumāro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko
S04bsu034_u:1053: atha khalu kumāra sa mahākaruṇācintī nāma rājakumāro yena bhagavān abhāvasamudgatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastenosaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu034_u:1054: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'sthāt //
S04bsu034_u:1055: atha khalu kumāra sa bhagavān abhāvasamudgatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahākaruṇācintino rājakumārasyādhyāśayaṃ viditvā imaṃ samādhiṃ deśayāmāsa /
S04bsu034_u:1056: atha khalu kumāra sa mahākaruṇācintī rājakumāraḥ imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ prasīdati sma /
S04bsu034_u:1057: prasannacittaśca keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajito 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:1059: udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt /
S04bsu034_u:1060: sa tainaiva kuśalamūlena [Vaidya_42] viṃśatikalpakoṭyo na jātu durgativinipātamagamat /
S04bsu034_u:1062: suvicintitārtho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi /
S04bsu034_u:1063: sarveṣu ca teṣu kalpeṣu viśatiṃ ca buddhakoṭīrārāgayāmāsa /
S04bsu034_u:1064: paśya kumāra yathāyaṃ samādhirbahukaro bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarasya buddhajñānasya paripūraṇāya saṃvartate //
S04bsu034_u:1065: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:1066: SRS_8.1 smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatītamadhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇamuttamaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1068: SRS_8.2 sa jātamātro gagane sthihitvā sarveṣa dharmāṇa abhāvu deśayī /
S04bsu034_u:1069: tadānurūpaṃ kṛtu nāmadheyaṃ śabdena sarvaṃ trisahasra vijñapī //
S04bsu034_u:1070: SRS_8.3 devāpi sarve pramumoca śabdaṃ abhāvu nāmneti jino bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu034_u:1071: yo jātamātraḥ pada sapta prakramannabhāvu dharmāṇa bravīti nāyakaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:1072: SRS_8.4 buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarveṣa dharmāṇa prakāśako muniḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1074: SRS_8.5 yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1075: tāvanti kho tasya tathāgatasya svaru niścarī lokavināyakasya //
S04bsu034_u:1076: SRS_8.6 tasmiṃśca kāle abhu rājaputraḥ karuṇāvicintī sada nāmadheyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1077: abhirūpa prāsādika darśanīya upāgamī tasya jinasya antikam //
S04bsu034_u:1078: SRS_8.7 vanditva pādau munipuṃgavasya pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtya ca gauraveṇa /
S04bsu034_u:1079: prasannacitto niṣasāda tatra śravaṇāya dharmaṃ virajamanuttaram //
S04bsu034_u:1080: SRS_8.8 sa co jino āśayu jñātva dhīraḥ prakāśayāmāsa samādhimetam /
S04bsu034_u:1081: śrutvā ca so imu virajaṃ samādhiṃ laghu pravrajī jinavaraśāsane 'smin //
S04bsu034_u:1082: SRS_8.9 sa pravrajitvāna imaṃ samādhiṃ dhāritva vācitva paryāpuṇitvā /
S04bsu034_u:1083: kalpāna koṭyaḥ paripūrṇa viṃśatiṃ na jātu gacche vinipātabhūmim //
S04bsu034_u:1084: SRS_8.10 sa tena caivaṃ kuśalena karmaṇā ārāgayī viṃśati buddhakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1085: teṣāṃ ca sarveṣu jināna antikādimaṃ varaṃ śānta samādhi bhāvayī //
S04bsu034_u:1086: SRS_8.11 sa paścikāle abhu buddha loke sucintitārtho sadanāmadheyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1087: kṛtvā ca arthaṃ bahuprāṇakoṭināṃ sa paścakālasmi śikhīva nirvṛtaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:1088: SRS_8.12 tasmāddhi ya icchati bodhi buddhituṃ sattvāṃśca uttarāyituṃ bhavārṇavāt /
S04bsu034_u:1089: dhāreta sūtramimu buddhavarṇitaṃ na durlabhā bheṣyati so 'grabodhiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:1093_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra
S04bsu034_u:1093_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
S04bsu034_u:1094: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīradharmakṣāntikuśalo bhavati?
S04bsu034_u:1095: iha kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māyopamāḥ sarvadharmā yathābhūtataḥ prajñātavyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1096: svapnopamā marīcyupamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamā udakacandropamā nirmitopamāḥ pratibimbopamā ākāśopamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ prajñātavyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1097: yadā ca kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māyopamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ parijñātā bhavanti,
S04bsu034_u:1098_0: svapnopamā marīcyupamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamā udakacandropamā nirmitopamāḥ
S04bsu034_u:1098_1: pratibimbopamā ākāśopamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ parijñātā bhavanti yathābhūtataḥ tadāyaṃ kumāra
S04bsu034_u:1099: sa gambhīrayā dharmakṣāntyā samanvāgato rañjanīyeṣu dharmeṣu na rajyate,
S04bsu034_u:1102: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi - sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati, taṃ dharmaṃ nopalabhate /
S04bsu034_u:1105: yo duṣyeta, yatra vā duṣyeta, yena vā duṣyeta /
S04bsu034_u:1106: yo muhyeta, yatra vā muhyeta, yena vā muhyeta /
S04bsu034_u:1107: sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati, taṃ dharma nopalabhate /
S04bsu034_u:1130_0: niṣkleśo vaśībhūtaḥ suvimuktacittaḥ suvimuktaprajñaḥ ājāneyo mahānāgaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ
S04bsu034_u:1158: atha khalu bhagavāstasyāṃ velāyamimā gāthā abhāṣata -

S04bsu034_u:1160: SRS_9.1 yada lokadhātu na vivarta bhoti ākāśu bhoti ayu sarvalokaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1162: yathaiva taṃ pūrvu tathaiva paścāt tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //

S04bsu034_u:1165: SRS_9.3 yathāntarīkṣasmi na kiṃcidabhraṃ kṣaṇena co dṛśyati abhramaṇḍalam /
S04bsu034_u:1166: pūrvāntu jānīya kutaḥ prasūtaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1167: SRS_9.4 tathāgatasyo yatha nirvṛtasya manasi karontaḥ pratibimbu dṛśyate /
S04bsu034_u:1168: yathaiva taṃ pūrvu tathaiva paścāt tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //

S04bsu034_u:1171: SRS_9.6 deve yathā varṣati sthūlabinduke pṛthak pṛthag budbuda saṃbhavanti /
S04bsu034_u:1172: utpannabhagnā na hi santi budbudāstathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1173: SRS_9.7 yathaiva grāmāntari lekhadarśanāt kriyāḥ pravartanti pṛthak śubhāśubhāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1174: na lekhasaṃkrānti girāya vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1175: SRS_9.8 yathā naro mānamadena mohito bhramanti saṃjānatimāṃ vasuṃdharām /
S04bsu034_u:1176: na co mahīyā calitaṃ na kampitaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1177: SRS_9.9 ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nāri mukhaṃ svalaṃkṛtam /
S04bsu034_u:1178: sā tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālā pradhāvitā kāma gaveṣamāṇā //
S04bsu034_u:1179: SRS_9.10 mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate /
S04bsu034_u:1180: yathā sa mūḍhā janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1181: SRS_9.11 yathaiva gandharvapuraṃ marīcikā yathaiva māyā supinaṃ yathaiva /
S04bsu034_u:1182: svabhāvaśūnyā tu nimittabhāvanā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1183: SRS_9.12 yathaiva candrasya nabhe viśuddhe hrade prasanne pratibimba dṛśyate /
S04bsu034_u:1184: śaśisya saṃkrānti jale na vidyate tallakṣaṇān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1185: SRS_9.13 yathā naraḥ śailavanāntare sthito bhaṇeyya gāyeyya haseyya rodaye /
S04bsu034_u:1186: pratiśrutkā śrūyati no ca dṛśyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1187: SRS_9.14 gīte ca vādye ca tathaiva rodite pratiśrutkā jāyati taṃ pratītya /
S04bsu034_u:1188: girāya ghoṣo na kadāci vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1189: SRS_9.15 yathaiva kāmān supinanta seviya pratibuddhasattvaḥ puruṣo na paśyati /
S04bsu034_u:1190: sa bāla kāmeṣvatikāmalobhī tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //

S04bsu034_u:1192: SRS_9.16 rūpān yathā nirmiṇi māyakāro hastīrathānaśvarathān vicitrān /
S04bsu034_u:1194: na cātra kaścid ratha tatra dṛśate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1195: SRS_9.17 yathā kumārī supināntarasmin sā putra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃ ca paśyati /
S04bsu034_u:1196: jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛte daurmanaḥsthitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1197: SRS_9.18 yathā mṛtāṃ mātaramātmajaṃ vā svapne tu vai roditi uccaśabdam /
S04bsu034_u:1198: na tasya mātā mriyate na putrastathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1199: SRS_9.19 yathaiva rātrau jala candra dṛśyate acchasmi vārismi anāvilasmi /
S04bsu034_u:1200: agrāhya tuccho jala candraśūnya tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1201: SRS_9.20 yathaiva grīṣmāṇa madhyāhnakāle tṛṣābhitaptaḥ puruṣo vrajeta /
S04bsu034_u:1202: marīcikāṃ paśyati toyarāśiṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1203: SRS_9.21 marīcikāyāmudakaṃ na vidyate sa mūḍha sattvaḥ pibituṃ tadicchati /
S04bsu034_u:1204: abhūtavāriṃ pibituṃ na śakyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1205: SRS_9.22 yathaiva ārdraṃ kadalīya skandhaṃ sārārthikaḥ puruṣu vipāṭayeta /
S04bsu034_u:1206: bahirvā adhyātma na sāramasti tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:1207: SRS_9.23 na cakṣuṃ pramāṇaṃ na śrotra ghrāṇaṃ na jihva pramāṇaṃ na kāyacittam /

S04bsu034_u:2042: SRS_14.90 na bahi ca śabdu pariṣātu prajā sarveṣa chindati sa kāṅkṣaśatān /

S04bsu034_u:2051: SRS_14.94 yāvanta kecijjina kāruṇikā jñānasmi sarvi vaśi pāramiṃ gatāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:2053: SRS_14.95 api kalpakoṭi bhaṇi apratimā yatha gaṅgavālika bhaṇeyya guṇān /
S04bsu034_u:2054: na ca śakyu kīrtitu pramāṇu guṇe bhaṇa kasya arthi smitu darśayase //
S04bsu034_u:2058: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhiḥ pratyabhāṣata -

S04bsu034_u:2063: SRS_15.3 sarvatra co eṣa mamāsi putro imāṃ caranto varabodhicārikām /

S04bsu034_u:2065: SRS_15.4 sa paścime kāli mahābhayānake tvameva sākṣī ajitā mamātra /

S04bsu034_u:2072: SRS_15.7 haste yathā āmalakāni pañca prajānāti buddhasahasrakoṭayaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:2089: SRS_15.15 svabhāvu dharmāṇamabhāvu jānase anābhilapyā gira saṃprabhāṣase /
S04bsu034_u:2090: siṃhena vā kroṣṭuka tīrtha nāśitā ye te viparyāsasthitā avidvasu //
S04bsu034_u:2091: SRS_15.16 nidhāna śreṣṭhaṃ mayi labdhamadya dharmaṃ nidhānaṃ sugatena deśitam /
S04bsu034_u:2092: prahīṇa sarvā vinipātu durgati kāṅkṣā na mehāsti bhaviṣya nāyakaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2093: SRS_15.17 mūrdhasmi pāṇiṃ pratisthāpayitvā suvarṇavarṇaṃ ruciraṃ prabhāsvaram /
S04bsu034_u:2094: abhiṣiñca bodhāya nararṣabhastaṃ sadevakaṃ loka sthapetva sākṣiṇam //
S04bsu034_u:2098: SRS_16.1 smarāmi pūrvaṃ caramāṇu cārikāṃ siṃhadhvajasya sugatasya śāsane /

S04bsu034_u:2110: SRS_16.7 tasmāt kumārā bahu paścakāle anusmaranto imu pārihāṇim /

S04bsu034_u:2116: SRS_16.10 hastāṃśca pādāṃśca tatha vidyamānā hāsye ca lāsye ca sadā prayuktāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:2120: SRS_16.12 te khādyapeyasmi sadā prayuktā nāṭye ya gīte ca tathaiva vādite /

S04bsu034_u:2124: SRS_16.14 ye karma buddhehi sadā vivarjitāstulamānakūṭe ca sadā prayuktāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2125: tatkarma kṛtvāna kiliṣṭapāpakān apāyu yāsyanti nihīnakarmāḥ //

S04bsu034_u:2127: SRS_16.15 prabhūtavittaṃ maṇihemaśaṃkhaṃ gṛhāṃśca jñātīṃśca vihāya pravraji /

S04bsu034_u:2136: SRS_16.19 bhedāya sthāsyanti ca te parasparaṃ ayuktibhirlābha gaveṣamāṇāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:2144: SRS_16.23 bhītāśca trastāśca gṛhaṃ tyajanti te pravraji dṛḍhatarā bhavanti /

S04bsu034_u:2146: SRS_16.24 nihīnaprajñā guṇaviprahīnā vakṣyanti doṣaṃ sada agrayāne /

S04bsu034_u:2148: SRS_16.25 ājīvakā ye bahu pravrajitvā anarthikāḥ sarvasubuddhabodhaye /

S04bsu034_u:2154: SRS_16.28 yo kho punarbheṣyati duṣṭacittaḥ sudāruṇo raudrātihīnakarmā /

S04bsu034_u:2156: SRS_16.29 ārocayāmi prativedayāmi sacet kumārā mama śraddha gacchasi /
S04bsu034_u:2157: imāṃ smaritvā sugatānuśāsanīṃ mā jātu viśvastu bhavesi teṣām //
S04bsu034_u:2158: te tīvrarāgāstatha tīvradoṣāste tīvramohāḥ sada mānamattāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2159: SRS_16.30 te tīvrarāgāstatha tīvradoṣāste tīvramohāḥ sada mānamattāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:2170: bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛto devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyanamaskṛtaḥ sāgaropamāyāṃ parṣadi dhama saṃdeśayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:2171_0: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantaṃ nirgataṃ viditvā aśītyā prāṇikoṭīśataiḥ
S04bsu034_u:2171_3: mahāmālyābhinirhāramādāya bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe yena gṛdhrakūṭaparvato yena ca bhagavāṃstenopajagāma /
S04bsu034_u:2172_0: upetya ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiḥ
S04bsu034_u:2173_0: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu034_u:2173_1: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśaṃ sacenme bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt
S04bsu034_u:2174: evamukte bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - pṛccha tvaṃ kumāra tathāgatamarhataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yad yadevākāṅkṣasi /
S04bsu034_u:2176: evamukte candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - katibhirbhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate?
S04bsu034_u:2177: evamukte bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - caturbhiḥ kumāra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:2179: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sūrato bhavati suvisaṃvāso dānto dāntabhūmimanuprāptaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2180: sa parairākruṣṭo vā paribhāṣito vā duruktānāṃ durbhāṣitānāṃ vacanapathānāṃ kṣamo bhavatyadhivāsanajātīyaḥ karmadarśī nihatamāno dharmakāmaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2181: anena kumāra prathamena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imaḥ samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:2182: punaraparaṃ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlavān bhavati /
S04bsu034_u:2183_1: acyutaśīlaḥ anāvilaśīlaḥ agarhitaśīlaḥ abhyudgataśīlaḥ aniśritaśīlaḥ aparāmṛṣṭaśīlaḥ

S04bsu034_u:2185: punaraparaṃ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvastraidhātuke uttrastacitto bhavati saṃtrastacitto nirviṇṇacitto niḥsaraṇacittaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2190: anena kumāra tṛtīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:2191: punaraparaṃ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāddho bhavati /
S04bsu034_u:2198: yathāśrutāṃśca dharmān yathāparyavāptān parebhyaśca vistareṇa deśayati saṃprakāśayati hitavastupūrvagamena cittena na jñātralābhakāmanayā /
S04bsu034_u:2199: api tu khalu punaḥ kimitīme sattvā imān dharmān śrutvā avinivartanīyā bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S04bsu034_u:2200: anena kumāra caturthena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate //
S04bsu034_u:2201_0: ebhiḥ kumāra caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ

S04bsu034_u:2584: SRS_18.5 satatamanabhibhūtapuṇyaskandho bhaviṣyati śreṣṭhataraṃ tu bodhicaryām /
S04bsu034_u:2585: na bhaviṣyati pratyarthiṃkāna dhṛṣyo imu varu śānta samādhi dhārayitvā //
S04bsu034_u:2586: SRS_18.6 jñānu vipulu tasya bhoti tīkṣṇaṃ tatha pratibhānamananta cakṣu śuddham /
S04bsu034_u:2587: bhaviṣyati sada tasya paṇḍitasya smṛtibalameva ca dhāraṇībalaṃ ca //
S04bsu034_u:2588: SRS_18.7 parama priyu manāpu paṇḍitānāṃ bhaviṣyati cārthapadaṃ prabhāṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2589: jñānu bahujanasya prajñavanto imu varu śānta samādhi bhāṣamāṇaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2590: SRS_18.8 lābhi parama śreṣṭha cīvarāṇāṃ śayya nimantraṇamā(khā ?)dyabhojanānām /
S04bsu034_u:2591: bhaviṣyati sukumāra darśanīyo imu varu śānta samādhi dhārayanto //
S04bsu034_u:2592: SRS_18.9 drakṣyati bahu buddha lokanāthān atuliya kāhiti pūja nāyakānām /
S04bsu034_u:2593: na ca bhaviṣyati tasya antarāyo imu varu śānta samādhimeṣato hi //
S04bsu034_u:2594: SRS_18.10 bhāṣiṣyati purataḥ sthitva lokanāthān surucira gāthaśatehi tuṣṭacittaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2595: na ca bhaviṣyati tasya jātu hānī imu varu śānta samādhi dhārayitvā //
S04bsu034_u:2596: SRS_18.11 sthāsyati purato 'sya lokanāthaḥ suruciralakṣaṇakāyu vyañjanebhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2597: na ca bhaviṣyati tasya jñānahānī imu varu śānta samādhi dhārayitvā //
S04bsu034_u:2598: SRS_18.12 na kadāci bhaviṣyati dīnacittaḥ satata bhaviṣyati āḍhyu no daridraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2599: na ca bhaviṣyati udgṛhītacitto imu varu śānta samādhi dhārayitvā //
S04bsu034_u:2600: SRS_18.13 na ca bhaviṣyati vā akṣaṇeṣu mahīpati bheṣyati rājacakravartī /
S04bsu034_u:2601: sada bhaviṣyati rājya tasya kṣemaṃ imu varu śānta samādhi dhārayitvā //
S04bsu034_u:2602: jñānu vipulu nātra saṃśayo 'sti kṣapayitu kalpaśatehi bhāṣamāṇaiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2603: SRS_18.14 jñānu vipulu nātra saṃśayo 'sti kṣapayitu kalpaśatehi bhāṣamāṇaiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2605: śruta imu samādhi śāntabhūmī yatha upadiṣṭa tathā sthiheta dhīro //
S04bsu034_u:2606: SRS_18.15 aparimita ananta kalpakoṭyo daśabala tasya bhaṇeyurathānuśaṃsām /
S04bsu034_u:2607: na ca parikīrtitā kalā bhaveyyā yatha jalabindu grahītu sāgarāto //
S04bsu034_u:2608: SRS_18.16 harṣitu sa kumāru tasmi kāle utthitu prāñjaliko namasyamānaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2612: SRS_18.18 ākhyāhi me mahāvīra hitaiṣī anukampakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2613: ko nāma paścime kāle idaṃ sūtraṃ śruṇiṣyati //
S04bsu034_u:2620: SRS_18.22 dhūtān guṇāṃśca saṃlekhān guṇān śreṣṭhān niṣevataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2621: pratipattau sthihitvā ca idaṃ sūtraṃ śruṇiṣyati //
S04bsu034_u:2622: SRS_18.23 na pāpakāriṇāṃ hastādidaṃ sūtraṃ śruṇiṣyati /
S04bsu034_u:2626: SRS_18.25 ye hi purimakā buddhā lokanāthā upasthitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2628: SRS_18.26 ye tu pūrvāsu jātīsu abhūvannanyatīrthikāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2629: teṣvimaṃ śrutva sūtrāntaṃ saumanasyaṃ na bheṣyati //
S04bsu034_u:2630: SRS_18.27 mama ca pravrajitveha śāsane jīvikārthikāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2632: SRS_18.28 adhyoṣitā parastrīṣu bahu bhikṣu asaṃyatā /
S04bsu034_u:2633: lābhakāmāśca duḥśīlā idaṃ sūtraṃ na śraddadhī //
S04bsu034_u:2636: SRS_18.30 laukika dhyānaphalasaṃjñī bheṣyate kāli paścime /
S04bsu034_u:2637: arhatpiṇḍaṃ ca te bhuktvā buddhabodhiṃ pratikṣipi //
S04bsu034_u:2638: SRS_18.31 yaścaiva jambudvīpasmi bhindeyāt sarva cetiyā /
S04bsu034_u:2640: SRS_18.32 yaścārhato nihaneyyā yathā gaṅgāya vālukāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2642: SRS_18.33 ka utsahanti yuṣmākaṃ paścime kāli dāruṇe /
S04bsu034_u:2643: saddharma loke vartante idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśitum //
S04bsu034_u:2646: SRS_18.35 ahaṃ nirvṛte saṃbuddhe paścime kāli dāruṇe /
S04bsu034_u:2647: sūtraṃ vaistārikaṃ kuryāṃ tyajitvā kāyu jīvitam //
S04bsu034_u:2650: SRS_18.37 kṣapeyaṃ pāpakaṃ karma yanmayā purime kṛtam /
S04bsu034_u:2652: SRS_18.38 sthapetva pāṇiṃ mūrdhasmi buddhaḥ kāñcanasaṃnibham /
S04bsu034_u:2654: SRS_18.39 karomi te adhiṣṭhānaṃ kumāra kāli paścime /
S04bsu034_u:2656: SRS_18.40 anye cāṣṭau śatānyatra utthitā dharmadhārakāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2657: vayaṃ hi paścime kāle asya sūtrasya dhārakāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2659: anye ca nayutāḥ ṣaṣṭi vandante lokanāyakam //
S04bsu034_u:2660: SRS_18.42 vayamimeṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ ya ime adya utthitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2661: tasmiṃśca paścime kāle rakṣāṃ kāhāma nāyaka //
S04bsu034_u:2662: SRS_18.43 asmin sūtre prabhāṣyante buddhakṣetrāḥ prakampitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2664: SRS_18.44 ye ca prakampitāḥ kṣetrāḥ sarveṣu buddhanirmitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2665: preṣitā lokanāthena ye hi dharmāḥ prakāśitāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2667: evaṃ dharmaṃ tadā śrutvā buddhajñāne pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2674: SRS_18.49 te 'pi vyākṛta buddhena drakṣyante lokanāyakān /
S04bsu034_u:2677: tatra tatra śruṇiṣyanti idaṃ sūtraṃ niruttaram //
S04bsu034_u:2680: SRS_18.52 maitreyasya ca buddhasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā niruttarām /
S04bsu034_u:2684: SRS_18.54 trisaptatirasaṃkhyeyā kalpā ye ca anāgatāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2686: SRS_18.55 ye kecit paścime kāle śroṣyante sūtramuttamam /
S04bsu034_u:2687: aśrupātaṃ ca kāhinti sarvaistaiḥ satkṛto hyaham //
S04bsu034_u:2688: SRS_18.56 ārocayāmi sarveṣāṃ yāvantaḥ purataḥ sthitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2689: parindāmi imāṃ bodhiṃ yā me kṛchreṇa sparśitā //
S04bsu034_u:2693: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā acintyabuddhadharmanirdeśakuśalena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:2697: acintyāṃśca buddhadharmān śrutvā nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S04bsu034_u:2698: evamukte candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - yathā kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ acintyabuddhadharmanirdeśakuśalo bhavati,
S04bsu034_u:2702: acintyāṃśca buddhadharmān śratvā nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate?
S04bsu034_u:2703: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaśikho nāma gandharvaputraḥ pañcabhistūryaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ gaganatalādavatīrya bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthito 'bhūdupasthānaparicaryāyai /
S04bsu034_u:2704: atha khalu pañcaśikhasya gandharvaputrasyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ yathaivaḥ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ śakrasya ca devānāmindrasya sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāmupasthānaparicaryāṃ karomi,
S04bsu034_u:2706: tathaivādya devātidevasyāpi tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjāyai saṃgītiṃ saṃprayojayeyam //
S04bsu034_u:2707_0: atha khalu pañcaśikho gandharvaputrastaiḥ pañcabhistūryaśataistaiśca pañcamātrairgandharvaputraśataiḥ
S04bsu034_u:2712: yattebhyaḥ pañcabhyastūryaśatebhyaḥ saṃprayuktebhyaḥ pravāditebhyo yathānakumpopasaṃhṛtaḥ śabdo niścarati dharmapratisaṃyuktaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2714: ekahi vālapathe bahubuddhā yāttika vālika gaṅganadīye /
S04bsu034_u:2715: SRS_19.1 ekahi vālapathe bahubuddhā yāttika vālika gaṅganadīye /
S04bsu034_u:2717: kṣetraṃ tāttika teṣa jinānāṃ te ca vilakṣaṇa te visabhāgāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2718: SRS_19.2 pañcagatīgata bālapathasmin nairayikā pi ca tiryagatāśca /
S04bsu034_u:2719: te yamalaukika devamanuṣyā nāpi ca saṃkaru no ca upīḍo //
S04bsu034_u:2720: SRS_19.3 tatra pade sasarāḥ sasamudrāḥ sarva nadī tatha utsa taḍāgāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2721: no pi ca saṃkaru no ca upīḍo evamacintiyu dharma jinānām //
S04bsu034_u:2722: SRS_19.4 tatra pade 'pi ca parvata neke cakravāla api meru sumeru /
S04bsu034_u:2723: ye mucilinda mahāmucilinda vindhyatha gṛdhrakūṭo himavāṃśca //
S04bsu034_u:2724: SRS_19.5 tatra pade nirayāśca sughorāstapana pratāpana ānabhiramyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2725: tatra ca ye niraye upapannā vedana te pi dukhāṃ anubhonti //
S04bsu034_u:2726: SRS_19.6 tatra pade 'pi ca devavimānā dvādaśayojana te ramaṇīyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2727: teṣu bahū marutān sahasrā divyaratīṣu sukhānyanubhonti //
S04bsu034_u:2728: SRS_19.7 tatra pade ca buddhāna utpādo śāsanu lokavidūna jvaleti /
S04bsu034_u:2729: taṃ ca na paśyati jñānavihīno yena na śodhita carya viśuddhā //
S04bsu034_u:2730: SRS_19.8 tatra pade 'pi ca dharma niruddho nirvṛtu nāyaku śrūyati śabdaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2731: tatra pade 'pi ca keci śṛṇonti tiṣṭhati nāyaku bhāṣati dharmam //
S04bsu034_u:2732: tatra pade 'pi ca keṣacidāyurvarṣa acintiya vartati saṃjñā /
S04bsu034_u:2733: SRS_19.9 tatra pade 'pi ca keṣacidāyurvarṣa acintiya vartati saṃjñā /
S04bsu034_u:2735: tatra pade 'pi vā kālu karonti no ciru jīvati śrūyati śabdaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2736: SRS_19.10 tatra pade 'pi ca keṣaci saṃjñā dṛṣṭu tathāgatu pūjitu buddho /
S04bsu034_u:2737: toṣitu mānasu saṃjñagraheṇa no pi ca pūjitu no ca upanno //
S04bsu034_u:2738: SRS_19.11 svasmi gṛhe supineva manuṣyo kāmaguṇeṣu ratīranubhūya /
S04bsu034_u:2739: sa pratibuddhu na paśyati kāmāṃstacca prajānati so supino ti //
S04bsu034_u:2740: SRS_19.12 yat tatha dṛṣṭu śruta mata jñātaṃ sarvamidaṃ vitathaṃ supino vā /
S04bsu034_u:2741: yastu bhaveta samādhiya lābhī so imu jānati dharmasvabhāvān //
S04bsu034_u:2742: SRS_19.13 sūsukhitāḥ sada te nara loke yeṣa priyāpriyu nāsti kahiṃcit /
S04bsu034_u:2744: SRS_19.14 yeṣa mamāpi tu nāsti kahiṃcid yeṣa parigrahu sarvaśu nāsti /
S04bsu034_u:2745: khaṅgasamā vicarantimu loke te gagane pavaneva vrajanti //
S04bsu034_u:2746: SRS_19.15 bhāvitu mārga pravartitu jñānaṃ śūnyaka dharma nirātmanu sarve /
S04bsu034_u:2747: yena vibhāvita bhontimi dharmāstasya bhavet pratibhānamanantam //
S04bsu034_u:2748: SRS_19.16 sūsukhitā bata te nara kole yeṣa na sajjati mānasu loke /
S04bsu034_u:2749: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣviha cittaṃ no ca priyāpriyu vidyati saṅgo //
S04bsu034_u:2750: SRS_19.17 apriyu ye dukhitehi nivāso ye hi priyā dukhi tehi viyogo /
S04bsu034_u:2751: anta ubhe api eti jahitvā te sukhitā nara ye rata dharme //
S04bsu034_u:2752: SRS_19.18 ye anunīyati śrutvimi dharmān sa pratihanyati śrutva adharmam /
S04bsu034_u:2753: so madamānahato viparīto mānavaśena dukhi anubhoti //
S04bsu034_u:2754: SRS_19.19 ye samatāya pratiṣṭhita bhonti nityamanunnata nāvanatāśca /
S04bsu034_u:2755: ye priyato 'priyataśca sumuktāste sada muktamanā viharanti //
S04bsu034_u:2756: SRS_19.20 śīle pratiṣṭhitu sūpariśuddhe dhyāne pratiṣṭhitu nityamacintye /
S04bsu034_u:2757: ye vanakandari śānti ramante teṣa na vidyati vīmati jātu //
S04bsu034_u:2758: SRS_19.21 ye ca punarvitathe pratipannāḥ kāmaguṇeṣu ratāḥ sada bālāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2760: asmin khalu punargāthābhinirhāre bhāṣyamāṇe candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ acintyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu gambhīranidhyaptinirdeśakauśalyamanuprāptaḥ,
S04bsu034_u:2762: pañcaśikhasya ca gandharvaputrasya ghoṣānugāyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:2763: aprameyāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni /
S04bsu034_u:2768: tatra khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvakuśalamūlaśikṣāguṇadharmaniśritena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:2770_1: prāmodyabahulena dharmārthikena dharmakāmena dharmaratena dharmaparigrāhakeṇa dharmānudharmapratipannena /
S04bsu034_u:2772: yasya cāntikādimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇoti, tena tasyāntike prītigauravaṃ śāstṛsaṃjñā cotpāditavyā/
S04bsu034_u:2773: yaḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imān dharmān samādāya vartate,
S04bsu034_u:2778: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:2779: SRS_20.1 abhyatīta bahukalpakoṭiyo aprameya atulā acintiyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2781: SRS_20.2 so samādhimimu śāntu deśayi yatra nāsti naru jīva pudgalaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2782: māya budbuda marīci vidyutā sarva dharma dakacandrasaṃnibhāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2783: SRS_20.3 nāsti sattva manujo ca labhyate kālu kṛtva paraloki gacchi yo /
S04bsu034_u:2784: no ca karma kṛtu vipraṇaśyate kṛṣṇa śukla phala deti tādṛśam //
S04bsu034_u:2785: SRS_20.4 eṣa yukti nayadvāra bhadrakaṃ sūkṣma durdṛśu jināna gocarā /
S04bsu034_u:2786: yatra akṣarapadaṃ na labhyate buddhabodhi bhagavān prajānati //
S04bsu034_u:2791: SRS_20.7 sarva bālajana bhūtacodanā tīrthikehi parivarjitaḥ sadā /
S04bsu034_u:2792: śreṣṭha śīladhanu buddhavarṇitaṃ vidyuteva gagane na lipyate //
S04bsu034_u:2793: SRS_20.8 yehi pūjita jināna koṭiyo dānaśīlacaritā vicakṣaṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2794: pāpamitra puri yehi varjitā teṣa paitṛkadhanaṃ niruttaram //
S04bsu034_u:2795: SRS_20.9 tatra bhikṣu sthitu dharmabhāṇako brahmacāri sugatasya aurasaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2796: śrutva dharmamimamānulomikaṃ citta pādesi ya lokanāyakaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2797: SRS_20.10 indraketudhvajarāju nāyako adhyabhāṣi abhu dharmabhāṇakam /
S04bsu034_u:2798: bhikṣubhāva paramaṃ ti duṣkaraṃ cittupāda vara agrabodhaye //
S04bsu034_u:2799: SRS_20.11 śīlu rakṣa maṇiratnasaṃnibhaṃ mitra seva sada ānulomikam /
S04bsu034_u:2800: pāpamitra na kadāci sevato buddhajñānamacireṇa lapsyase //
S04bsu034_u:2804: SRS_21.1 āsi pūrvamiha jambusāhvaye apramatta duvi śreṣṭhidārakau /
S04bsu034_u:2807: antarikṣapadabhūmikovidau te asakta gagane vrajanti ca //
S04bsu034_u:2808: SRS_21.3 te ca tatra vanaṣaṇḍi śītale nānapuṣpabharite manorame /
S04bsu034_u:2810: SRS_21.4 tena rāja mṛgayā aṭantake śabda śrutva vanu taṃ upāgamī /
S04bsu034_u:2811: dṛṣṭva pārthiva tatha dharmabhāṇakau teṣu prema paramaṃ upasthahi //
S04bsu034_u:2812: SRS_21.5 tehi sārdhu katha ānulomikīṃ kṛtva rāju purato niṣīdi so /
S04bsu034_u:2814: SRS_21.6 ekameku teṣu dharmabhāṇako rājamabravī śṛṇohi kṣatriyā /
S04bsu034_u:2815: buddhapādu paramaṃ sudurlabho apramattu sada bhohi pārthiva //
S04bsu034_u:2816: SRS_21.7 āyu gacchati sadānavasthitaṃ girinadīya salileva śīghragam /
S04bsu034_u:2817: vyādhiśokajarapīḍitasya te nāsti trāṇu yatha karma bhadrakam //
S04bsu034_u:2818: SRS_21.8 dharmapālu bhava rājakuñjarā rakṣimaṃ daśabalāna śāsanam /
S04bsu034_u:2819: kṣīṇa kāli parame sudāruṇe dharmapakṣi sthihi rājakuñjara //
S04bsu034_u:2820: SRS_21.9 eva te bahuprakāra paṇḍitā ovadanti tada taṃ narādhipam /
S04bsu034_u:2822: SRS_21.10 śrutva dharma tada rājakuñjaraḥ sūratānakhilāna bhāṣato /
S04bsu034_u:2823: prītijāta sumanā udagrako vandya pāda śirasāya prakramī //
S04bsu034_u:2824: SRS_21.11 tasya rājña bahavo 'nyabhikṣavo lābhakāma praviśintu tat kulam /
S04bsu034_u:2825: teṣa dṛṣṭa cariyā na tādṛśī teṣu rāja na tathā sagauravam //
S04bsu034_u:2826: SRS_21.12 tacca śāsanamatītaśāstukaṃ paścimaṃ ca tada varṣu vartate /
S04bsu034_u:2828: SRS_21.13 utka lubdha bahu tatra bhikṣavo lābhakāma upalambhadṛṣṭikāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2829: vipranaṣṭa sugatasya śāsanād grāhayiṃsu bahulaṃ tadā nṛpam //

S04bsu034_u:2833: SRS_21.15 karma naśyati vipāku naśyati skandha nāstīti vadanti kuhakāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:2848: SRS_21.21 te sma śrutva tava mūlamāgatā sarvi bhūta tava vijñapematha /

S04bsu034_u:2851: SRS_21.22 saṃnahitva tada rājakuñjaro pāpamitravacanena prasthitaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:2856: SRS_21.24 pāpamitravacanena paśyathā kālu kṛtva tada rāja dāruṇam /

S04bsu034_u:2860: SRS_21.26 devatā yāya rāju codito yāya rakṣita dharmabhāṇakau /

S04bsu034_u:2866: SRS_21.29 etu śrutva vacanaṃ niruttaraṃ śīlabrahmaguṇajñānasaṃcayam /
S04bsu034_u:2874: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāt tarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kāye 'nadhyavasitena jīvite nirapekṣeṇa bhavitavyam /

S04bsu034_u:2889: śītalo niṣparidānaḥ animittaḥ amanyitaḥ aninditaḥ aprapañcitaḥ - alpaśabdo nirdeśena /

S04bsu034_u:2894: SRS_22.1 ya icche lokanāthasya kāyaṃ jānitumīdṛśam /
S04bsu034_u:2895: imaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvitvā kāyaṃ buddhasya jñāsyati //
S04bsu034_u:2896: SRS_22.2 puṇyanirjātu buddhasya kāyaḥ śuddhaḥ prabhāsvaraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2898: SRS_22.3 yādṛśā bodhirbuddhasya lakṣaṇāni ca tādṛśāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2900: SRS_22.4 saṃbodhilakṣaṇaḥ kāyo buddhakṣetraṃ hi tādṛśam /
S04bsu034_u:2902: SRS_22.5 evaṃ saṃbhavu buddhānāṃ lokanāthāna īdṛśaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2904: SRS_22.6 bahū evaṃ pravakṣyanti dṛṣṭo me lokanāyakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2909: na ca pramāṇaṃ kāyasya labdhaṃ tena acintiyaḥ //

S04bsu034_u:2914: SRS_22.11 na caiṣa kenacijjātu samādhiḥ śāntu bhāvitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2917: samādherasya vaipulyāt kāyo mahyaṃ na dṛśyate //

S04bsu034_u:2922: SRS_22.15 yasya co mṛdukī saṃjñā nāmarūpasmi vartate /

S04bsu034_u:2926: SRS_22.17 anāsravaṃ ca me cittaṃ kalpakoṭyo hyacintiyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2927: karomi cārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na ca me kāyu dṛśyate //
S04bsu034_u:2928: SRS_22.18 yathā ca yasya bhāvehi vimuktaṃ bhoti mānasam /

S04bsu034_u:2930: SRS_22.19 vimuktaṃ mama vijñānaṃ sarvabhāvehi sarvaśaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2931: svabhāvo jñātu cittasya bhūyo jñānaṃ pravartate //
S04bsu034_u:2933: kurvanti cārthaṃ sattvānāṃ yatra kāyo na labhyate //
S04bsu034_u:2934: SRS_22.21 alakṣaṇo nirnimitto yathaiva gaganaṃ tathā /
S04bsu034_u:2936: SRS_22.22 dharmakāyo mahāvīro dharmeṇa kāya nirjito /
S04bsu034_u:2937: na jātu rūpakāyeṇa śakyaṃ prajñāpituṃ jino //
S04bsu034_u:2940: SRS_22.24 śrutvā ca dharmaṃ gambhīraṃ yasya trāso na bheṣyati /
S04bsu034_u:2944: tatra kumāra tathāgatasya kāyo nimittakarmaṇāpi na sukaraṃ jñātum /

S04bsu034_u:2954: vaidūryo vā vaidūryavarṇo vā vaidūryanidarśano vā vaidūryanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:2955: vidyudvā vā vidyudvarṇo vā vidyunnidarśano vā vidyunnirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:2956: brahmo vā brahmavarṇo vā brahmanidarśano vā brahmanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:2957: devo vā devavarṇo vā devanidarśano vā devanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:2958: iti hi kumāra tathāgatasya kāyaḥ śuddhaḥ sarvanimittairapyacintyaḥ apyacintyanirdeśo rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā /

S04bsu034_u:2960: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:2964: na teṣāṃ labhyate anto ettakā paramāṇavaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2970: SRS_22.29 ye mayā ātmabhāvasya bhūtavarṇā nidarśitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2973: śakyaṃ jānituṃ buddhasya viśeṣo hīdṛśo mama //
S04bsu034_u:2978: SRS_22.33 cittenāpi na buddhānāṃ kāyaścintayituṃ kṣamaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2979: tathā hi tasya kāyasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate //
S04bsu034_u:2980: SRS_22.34 aprameyā hi te dharmāḥ kalpakoṭyo niṣevitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2981: teno acintiyaḥ kāyo nirvṛto me prabhāsvaraḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2982: SRS_22.35 agrāhyaḥ sarvasattvehi na pramāṇehi gṛhyate /
S04bsu034_u:2983: tathā hi kāyo buddhasya apramāṇo hyacintiyaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:2984: SRS_22.36 apramāṇehi dharmehi pramāṇaṃ tatra kalpitam /
S04bsu034_u:2988: SRS_22.38 apramāṇaṃ yathākāśaṃ mātuṃ śakyaṃ na kenacit /
S04bsu034_u:2990: SRS_22.39 ye kāyamevaṃ jānanti buddhānāṃ te jinātmajāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2995: tasmāttarhi kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ākāṅkṣet kimityahaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryāmiti /
S04bsu034_u:2999: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ samādhirudgrahītavyaḥ partavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
S04bsu034_u:3003: imāḥ kumāra bodhisattvo dharmapratisaṃvida evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate - yāvanto vā rūpavyāhārāstāvantastathāgatasya varṇavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3006: iti hi kumāra aprameyā acintyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ atulyāmāpyāparimāṇāstathāgatasya rūpavarṇavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3007: iti hi kumāra aparyantā anantā rūpavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3010: iti hi anantā aparyantā acintyā vijñānavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3012: iti hi kumāra aprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ saṃskṛte doṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3015: iti hi kumāra yāvanti nirvāṇanāmāni tāvantastathāgatasya varṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3018: catvāra ime kumāra tathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3023: ime kumāra catvārastathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3024: catvāra ime kumāra tathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyanirdeśāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3096: iti hi yā kumāra dhāraṇī tajjñānam, sa dharmaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3100: dharmajñāne yā vyavahāradeśanā ācakṣaṇā prajñapanā prakāśanā prasthāpanā vicaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkaraṇatā asaktavacanatā anelāmūkavacanatā anavalīnavacanatā,
S04bsu034_u:3102: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:3103: SRS_23.1 yāttakaṃ jñānu buddhasya rūpaprajñapti tāttikā /
S04bsu034_u:3109: SRS_23.4 anantā nāmavyāhārā ye me pūrvaṃ prakāśitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3110: śīlanāmā buddhanāmā sattvanāmā ca te samāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3111: SRS_23.5 yāttakāḥ saṃskṛte doṣā nirvāṇe tāttakā guṇāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:3127: SRS_23.13 yathā yathā prakāśenti śraddadhanto imaṃ nayam /
S04bsu034_u:3132: tatra kumāra kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmapratisaṃvidi caran dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī samudāgacchatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?

S04bsu034_u:3140: anyad rūpamanyo rūpasvabhāva iti naivaṃ paśyati /

S04bsu034_u:3144: evaṃ nānyatra vedanāyā nānyatra saṃjñāyā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānena bodhiṃ samanupaśyati /
S04bsu034_u:3153: yaśca vijñānasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā /
S04bsu034_u:3155: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:3156: SRS_24.1 rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam /
S04bsu034_u:3158: SRS_24.2 śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ /

S04bsu034_u:3164: SRS_24.5 nirvāṇaṃ nirvṛtī vuttā nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate /
S04bsu034_u:3168: SRS_24.7 paśyitvā kāyu buddhasya vakṣyante dṛṣṭu nāyakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3169: na cāhaṃ rūpakāyena paśyituṃ śakya kenacit //

S04bsu034_u:3172: SRS_24.9 evaṃ pañcāna skandhānāṃ jñānaṃ me dharmalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu034_u:3175: na ca dharmata buddhānāṃ śakyaṃ vācāya bhāṣitum //
S04bsu034_u:3176: SRS_24.11 imaṃ nayamajānanto buddhaśabdaṃ śruṇitva te /

S04bsu034_u:3181: na cānyā śūnyatā uktā anyā rūpasvabhāvatā /
S04bsu034_u:3182: yastu rūpaṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti śunyatām //
S04bsu034_u:3183: SRS_24.14 yaḥ śūnyatāṃ prajānāti īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu034_u:3185: SRS_24.15 prajānāti hi yo rūpaṃ sa prajānāti śūnyatām /
S04bsu034_u:3186: ya śūnyatāṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti nirvṛtim //
S04bsu034_u:3189: SRS_24.17 vañcitā jñātralābhena pranaṣṭā mama śāsanāt /
S04bsu034_u:3193: SRS_24.19 kecidevaṃ pravakṣyanti vayaṃ bodhāya prasthitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3197: SRS_24.21 lābhakāmā bhaviṣyanti saṃnipāte hi cintakāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3204: praviśya ca gṛhāṃsteṣāṃ dūṣayiṣyanti tān kulān //
S04bsu034_u:3210: yathā te pravrajitvā hi paradāreṣu mūrcchitāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3211: SRS_24.28 śikṣāvadātavastrāṇaṃ gṛhīṇaṃ yā mi darśitā /
S04bsu034_u:3212: sā śikṣā teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tasmin kāle na bheṣyati //
S04bsu034_u:3213: SRS_24.29 bherīśaṅkhamṛdaṅgehi pūjāṃ kāhenti te mama /
S04bsu034_u:3214: yā ca sā uttamā pūjā pratipattirna bheṣyati //
S04bsu034_u:3215: SRS_24.30 te ātmanā suduḥśīlā dṛṣṭvā śīlapratiṣṭhitān /
S04bsu034_u:3217: SRS_24.31 śrutvā śīlasya te varṇaṃ duḥśīlāḥ pāpagocarāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3219: SRS_24.32 na ca hrī bheṣyate teṣāṃ naṣṭaṃ śrāmaṇakaṃ dhanam /
S04bsu034_u:3223: SRS_24.34 na me śrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ vā yeṣāmetādṛśī carī /
S04bsu034_u:3225: SRS_24.35 yā teṣāṃ kuhanā tatra śāṭhiyaṃ vākkiyaṃ tadā /
S04bsu034_u:3226: jānāmi tadahaṃ sarvaṃ jñānaṃ me 'tra pravartate //
S04bsu034_u:3227: SRS_24.36 sacet kalpaṃ prabhāṣeyaṃ yatteṣāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu /

S04bsu034_u:3294: tatra bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhiṃ kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenopāyakuśalena bhavitavyam /

S04bsu034_u:3298: trirātryāstridivasasya sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlapuṇyaskandhamanumodya sarvajñatārambaṇena cittotpādena teṣāmeva sarvasattvānāṃ niryātayitavyam /

S04bsu034_u:3302: SRS_25.1 sarve mama jñātaya eti sattvāḥ yasteṣamastī pṛthu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3303: rātrestrirevaṃ divasasya ca trīranumodamī emu janitva cittam //

S04bsu034_u:3307: anumodamī ye sugatasya pūjāṃ kurvanti bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3308: anumodamī yeṣa na ātmadṛṣṭirna bhāvadṛṣṭirna ca jīvadṛṣṭiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3309: SRS_25.4 anumodamī yeṣa na ātmadṛṣṭirna bhāvadṛṣṭirna ca jīvadṛṣṭiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3311: anumodamī yeṣa na pāpadṛṣṭirye śūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭva janenti tuṣṭim //
S04bsu034_u:3312: SRS_25.5 anumodamī ye sugatasya śāsane labhanti pravrajyopasaṃpadaṃ ca /

S04bsu034_u:3316: SRS_25.7 anumodamī yeṣa na saṃstavo 'sti na cāpi īrṣyā na kuleṣu tṛṣṇā /
S04bsu034_u:3317: uttrasti traidhātuki nityakālam anopaliptā vicaranti loke //
S04bsu034_u:3318: SRS_25.8 anumodamī yeṣa prapañcu nāsti nirviṇṇa sarvāsu bhavopapattiṣu /
S04bsu034_u:3320: SRS_25.9 anumodamī ye gaṇadoṣa dṛṣṭvā sarvān vivādān parivarjayitvā /
S04bsu034_u:3322: SRS_25.10 anumodamī ye viharantyaraṇye nātmānamutkarṣi parānna paṃsaye /
S04bsu034_u:3323: anumodamī yeṣa pramādu nāsti ye apramattā ima buddhaśāsane //
S04bsu034_u:3324: SRS_25.11 yāvanta dharmāḥ pṛthu bodhipākṣikāḥ sarveṣa mūlaṃ hyayamapramādaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:3327: SRS_25.12 nidhānalābhaḥ sugatāna śāsanaṃ pravrajyalābho dvitīyaṃ nidhānam /
S04bsu034_u:3330: SRS_25.13 śratvā imaṃ śūnyata buddhagocaraṃ tasyāpratikṣepu nidhānalambhaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3331: anantu pratibhānu nidhānalambho yā dhāraṇī tat paramaṃ nidhānam //
S04bsu034_u:3332: SRS_25.14 yāvanti dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaṃ śrutaṃ tyāgu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3333: sarveṣa mūlaṃ hyayamapramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśitaḥ //

S04bsu034_u:3342: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ apramatto bhavati?

S04bsu034_u:3345: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaśīlo bhavati /

S04bsu034_u:3348: tān śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /

S04bsu034_u:3363: SRS_26.1 nigṛhītaṃ si mātsaryaṃ tyāgacittaṃ ca bṛṃhitam /
S04bsu034_u:3365: SRS_26.2 jātamātrasya cittaṃ si tyāga eva pravartate /
S04bsu034_u:3367: SRS_26.3 viśāradaśca parṣatsu ama rūpa saṃkramet /
S04bsu034_u:3369: SRS_26.4 mṛdū hastau ca pādau ca bhaviṣyanti na durlabhāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3371: SRS_26.5 mātsaryacittaṃ si na jātu bhoti tyāgeṣu citta ramate 'sya nityam /
S04bsu034_u:3372: priyaśca bhoti bahusattvakoṭināṃ amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3373: SRS_26.6 mahādhane cāpi kule sa jāyate jātasya tyāge ramate mano 'sya /
S04bsu034_u:3375: SRS_26.7 viśāradaśco pariṣāṃ vigāhate udāraśabdo 'sya diśāsu yāti /
S04bsu034_u:3376: mṛdu hastapādo 'sya sadaiva jāyate amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3377: SRS_26.8 kalyāṇamitrāsya na bhonti durlabhā buddhāṃśca yo paśyati śrāvakāṃśca /
S04bsu034_u:3378: dṛṣṭvā ca tān pūjayate prasanno amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3382: daśeme kumāra anuśaṃsāḥ pariśuddhaśīlasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3383: katame daśa? yaduta jñānaṃ ca pariśodhayati paripūrayati /
S04bsu034_u:3393: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ pariśuddhaśīlasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3397: SRS_27.2 pratijñāto na calati pratipattau ca tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu034_u:3399: SRS_27.3 niṣparyutthito viharati samādhiṃ labhate laghu /
S04bsu034_u:3401: SRS_27.4 jñānaṃ ca tasyo paripūrṇu bhoti anuśikṣate cāti tathāgatānām /
S04bsu034_u:3402: na cāsya nindāṃ prakaronti paṇḍitāḥ tathā hi tasyo pariśuddha śīlam //
S04bsu034_u:3403: SRS_27.5 pratijñāto 'sau na calāti paṇḍitaḥ tathā hi śūraḥ pratipattiye sthitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3404: dṛṣṭvā ca saṃsāramanekadoṣaṃ palāyate nirvṛti yena yāti //

S04bsu034_u:3406: kṣipraṃ samādhiṃ labhate niraṅgaṇaṃ pariśuddhaśīlasyimi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3410: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ kṣāntipratiṣṭhitasya maitrīvihāriṇo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3421: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ kṣāntipratiṣṭhitasya maitrīvihāriṇo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3423: SRS_28.1 agninā dahyate nāsau śastreṇa na ca hanyate /
S04bsu034_u:3424: viṣaṃ na kramate kāye udake mriyate na saḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3425: SRS_28.2 rakṣanti devatāścainaṃ dvātriṃśad bhonti lakṣaṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3427: SRS_28.3 brahmatvaṃ atha śakratvaṃ bhoti cāsya na durlabham /
S04bsu034_u:3428: sukhaṃ viharate nityaṃ priti bhonti acintiyā //
S04bsu034_u:3429: SRS_28.4 no agniśastreṇa sa jātu hanyate viṣeṇa vā vārigato na mriyate /
S04bsu034_u:3430: rakṣanti devāstatha nāga yakṣā maitrīvihāriṣyimi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3431: SRS_28.5 dvātriṃśa kāye 'sya bhavanti lakṣaṇā no cāsya bhūyo vinipātu bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:3432: cyutaśca sa brahmapuropapadyate kṣāntisthitasyo imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3433: SRS_28.6 sukhena rātriṃdiva tasya yānti prītisphuṭaḥ kāyu tadāsya bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:3434: sa kṣāntisauratyabale pratiṣṭhitaḥ prasannacittaḥ sada bhoti paṇḍitaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3435: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā ārabdhavīryasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3445: ibhe kumāra daśānuśaṃsā ārabdhavīryasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3448: SRS_28.7 durāsadaḥ sadā bhoti paridāho na vidyate /
S04bsu034_u:3449: rakṣanti devatāścainaṃ kṣipraṃ buddhān sa paśyati //
S04bsu034_u:3450: SRS_28.8 śrutaṃ na hīyate tasya aśrataṃ bhoti āmukham /
S04bsu034_u:3452: SRS_28.9 samādhigotraṃ labhate vyādhiścāsya na jāyate /
S04bsu034_u:3454: SRS_28.10 utpalaṃ varimadhye va so 'nupūrveṇa vardhate /
S04bsu034_u:3456: SRS_28.11 avandhyāścāsya gacchanti rātrayo divasāni ca /
S04bsu034_u:3460: SRS_28.13 ārabdhavīryo bhavatī durāsadaḥ parigṛhīto bhavatī jinehi /
S04bsu034_u:3461: devā pi tasya spṛha saṃjanenti nacireṇa so lapsyati buddhabodhim //
S04bsu034_u:3462: SRS_28.14 śrataṃ ca tasyo na kadāci hīyate anye pṛthū cāpi labhanti dharmāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:3464: SRS_28.15 samādhigotraṃ ca laghuṃ dhigacchati ābādhu tasyo na kadāci bhoti /

S04bsu034_u:3466: SRS_28.16 rātriṃdivaṃ bhavati śuklapakṣo ārabdhavīryasya atandritasya /

S04bsu034_u:3469: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā dhyānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3480: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā dhyānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3482: SRS_28.17 nāsau bhoti anācāro ācāre saṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3483: gocare carate yogī varjeti ca agocaram //
S04bsu034_u:3488: SRS_28.20 yogino hi viśeṣo 'yaṃ yadeko ramate vane /
S04bsu034_u:3489: vimuktiṃ paripāceti taṃ bhoti daśamaṃ padam //
S04bsu034_u:3490: SRS_28.21 ācāri so tiṣṭhati bodhisattvaḥ sarvānanācāru vivarjayitvā /
S04bsu034_u:3491: agocaraṃ varjiya gocare sthitaḥ samādhiyukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3492: SRS_28.22 paridāhu tasyo na kadāci bhoti āryaṃ spṛśitveha sukhaṃ nirāmiṣam /
S04bsu034_u:3493: kāyena cittena ca bhoti śītalaḥ samādhiyukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3494: SRS_28.23 viharatyaraṇyāyataneṣu gupto vikṣepu tasyo na kadāci bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:3495: prītiṃ ca tasmillaṃbhate nirāmiṣaṃ tathā hi kāyena viviktu bhoti //
S04bsu034_u:3496: SRS_28.24 alipta kāmehi asaṃkiliṣṭo tathā hi māraviṣayāttu muktaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3497: tathāgatānāṃ viṣaye pratiṣṭhito vimukti tasyo paripāku gacchati //
S04bsu034_u:3498: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ prajñācaritasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3499: katame daśa? yaduta sarvasvaparityāgo bhavati na ca dānena śuddhiṃ manyate /
S04bsu034_u:3504: durdharṣaśca bhavati māraiḥ, aprakampyaśca bhavati sarvaparapravādibhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3509: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ prajñācaritasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3511: SRS_28.25 sarvasvaṃ tyajate dhīraḥ śuddhiṃ tena na manyate /
S04bsu034_u:3512: akhaṇḍaṃ rakṣate śīlaṃ niśrayo 'sya na vidyate //
S04bsu034_u:3513: SRS_28.26 kṣāntiṃ bhāveti sa prājñaḥ sattvasaṃjñā vivartitā /
S04bsu034_u:3515: SRS_28.27 dhyānadhyāyī ca so bhoti apratiṣṭho aniśritaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3516: durdharṣo bhoti mārehi prajñāvanta ime guṇāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3517: SRS_28.28 akampiyo ca so bhoti sarvaiḥ parapravādibhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3519: SRS_28.29 mahākṛpāṃ sa labhate sarvasattvāna antike /

S04bsu034_u:3710: iti hi kumāra evaṃrūpeṣu dhūtaguṇeṣu pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'raṇye viharan buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /

S04bsu034_u:3717: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu034_u:3719: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:3720: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?

S04bsu034_u:3724: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:3725: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
S04bsu034_u:3729: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /

S04bsu034_u:3732: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /

S04bsu034_u:3748: SRS_29.1 smaramī atīta bahukalpaśatā yada āsi nāyaku anantayaśāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:3766: SRS_29.9 tehi niṣevita udyānaśatā mucilindavārṣika aśokaśataiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3768: SRS_29.10 padumaiḥ sahasraśatapatracitā imi puṣpa puṣkariṇiśobhakarāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3770: SRS_29.11 tahi kāli rāja iha jambudhvaje dṛḍhadattu āsi manujādhipatiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3771: putrāṇa tasya abhu pañcaśatāḥ prāsādikāḥ paramadarśanikāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3772: SRS_29.12 tahi kāli rājyu śivu kṣema abhūt anupadrutaṃ suramaṇīya śivam /
S04bsu034_u:3773: ayu jambudvīpa kusumairnicito nirviṃśeṣa devabhavanehi samam //
S04bsu034_u:3774: SRS_29.13 tahi kāli so daśabalo anidho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /

S04bsu034_u:3788: na ca sa prajānatīha svabhāvu kvaci agatāgatī nipuṇadharmagatī /
S04bsu034_u:3789: SRS_29.20 na ca sa prajānatīha svabhāvu kvaci agatāgatī nipuṇadharmagatī /

S04bsu034_u:3793: asthitā aniśritā svabhāvagatī jinagocaro viraju śāntapadam //
S04bsu034_u:3794: SRS_29.22 śāntapraśānta upaśāntagatī na ca sā gatī kvacana saṃsthihatī /
