S04bsu034_u:3796: SRS_29.23 na ca sā calā hi svayameva sthitā asthitā anāgata svabhāvu sthitā /
S04bsu034_u:3797: na ca śakya bhāṣitu svabhāvu sthitī śūnyā ca sā acalu dharmasthitī //
S04bsu034_u:3798: SRS_29.24 ghoṣaśca ukta na ca ghoṣagatī ghoṣasvabhāvagati dharmagatī /
S04bsu034_u:3799: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu sthitī ca kvaci evaṃsvabhāvu gati dharmagatī //
S04bsu034_u:3800: SRS_29.25 gatiśabda uktu na ca sattvagatī dharmasvabhāva nipuṇārthagatī /
S04bsu034_u:3801: ghoṣo 'pi coktu na ca sattvagatī na ca ghoṣu labhyati na sattvagatiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3802: SRS_29.26 na ca ananta nānta na ca madhyagatiḥ naivāsti nāsti na ca deśagatī /
S04bsu034_u:3803: jñātā ca yādṛśa svabhāvagatī iya deśanā jinavarāṇa samā //
S04bsu034_u:3804: SRS_29.27 virajaṃ viśuddhi paramārthapadaṃ śānta praśānta arajaṃ virajam /
S04bsu034_u:3805: na ca kalpa manyana praśāntapadaṃ jinu bhāṣate paramakāruṇiko //
S04bsu034_u:3806: SRS_29.28 na pi cāsti akṣarapracāra iho vipulā gatirvipulā arthagatī /
S04bsu034_u:3807: buddhehi sevita jinehi stutā avabhāsa dharmanaya sūkṣmagatī //
S04bsu034_u:3808: SRS_29.29 dharmanidhāna virajaṃ vipulaṃ yatra sthitā apratimā sugatā /
S04bsu034_u:3810: SRS_29.30 aśrauṣi rāja dṛḍhadattu tadā dvipadendra bhāṣati samādhimimam /
S04bsu034_u:3811: so 'śītikoṭinayutehi tadā upasaṃkramī tada jinu kāruṇikam //
S04bsu034_u:3812: SRS_29.31 balavantu gauravu janetva jine vanditva pādu manujādhipatiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3813: purataḥ sthito daśabalasya tadā kṛtāñjalirdaśanakhaḥ pramuditaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3814: SRS_29.32 tasyo viditva pariśuddha carīṃ jina indriyeṣu vaśi pāragataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3815: adhumuktikovidu naraḥ pravaro imu tasya deśayi samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3816: SRS_29.33 yada tena rājña paramārtha śruto utpanna prīti ariyā vipulā /
S04bsu034_u:3817: ujjhitva dvīpa sakalāṃścaturo vijahitva kāma abhiniṣkrami so //
S04bsu034_u:3818: SRS_29.34 yada rāja pravraji jahitva mahīṃ bodhāya arthiku bhaviṣyajinaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3819: sarve manuṣya iha jambudhvaje vijahitva kāmaratī pravrajitā //
S04bsu034_u:3820: vipulo gaṇo daśabalasya tadā bahu bhikṣu bhikṣuṇi prayuktamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3821: SRS_29.35 vipulo gaṇo daśabalasya tadā bahu bhikṣu bhikṣuṇi prayuktamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3823: akṛṣṭā anupta tada oṣadhayo prādurbhūtā marutparicarāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3824: SRS_29.36 kāṣāya tricīvara prādurbhūtā samacchinna susīvita te 'nupamāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3825: amalā virajāśca suvarṇacittā buddhasya guṇocita puṇyabalāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3826: SRS_29.37 paśyo kumāra sa hi rājavaro vijahitva sarva mahi pravrajitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3827: bheṣyanti sattva kṣayakāli bahu aparīttabhogā na tyajanti gṛhān //
S04bsu034_u:3828: SRS_29.38 tāḍana bandhana kudaṇḍa bahu ākrośa tarjanamaniṣṭadukham /
S04bsu034_u:3829: sahiṣyanti rājakula pīḍa bahu suparīttabhoga na ca bhaktu gṛhe //
S04bsu034_u:3830: SRS_29.39 aparītta āyu na ca asti dhanaṃ sumahān pramādu na ca puṇyabalam /
S04bsu034_u:3831: na ca śilpasthānakuśalā abudhā dāridriyaṃ ca na ca vittu gṛhe //
S04bsu034_u:3833: saṃkliṣṭadharma na ca vṛttu sthitā vakṣyanti buddha bhaviṣyām vayam //
S04bsu034_u:3834: SRS_29.41 utkocavañcanaka sāhasikā ahamāḍhyu dharma dhanadāsmi jage /
S04bsu034_u:3835: upaghātakāḥ kuhaka naikṛtikā vakṣyanti buddha bhaviṣyāma vayam //
S04bsu034_u:3836: SRS_29.42 vadhabandhupadravi parasya ratāḥ duḥśīla dāruṇa praduṣṭamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3837: akṛtajña bhedaka vihiṃsasthitā vakṣyanti haṃ te bhaṇa bodhicarim //
S04bsu034_u:3838: yasyaiva tena śruta bodhicarī tasyaiva madhyi pratighaṃ janayī /
S04bsu034_u:3839: SRS_29.43 yasyaiva tena śruta bodhicarī tasyaiva madhyi pratighaṃ janayī /
S04bsu034_u:3841: śrutvā ca budhaṃ skhalitamekapadaṃ tasyaiva bhāṣati avarṇaśatān //
S04bsu034_u:3842: SRS_29.44 tadimāṃ kumāra mama śrutva giraṃ mā tehi saṃstavu karohi tadā /
S04bsu034_u:3843: supināntare 'pi aviśvasta siyā yadi icchase spṛśitu bodhicarīm //
S04bsu034_u:3844: SRS_29.45 dhūtavṛtta saṃlikhita naikaguṇān parikīrtayantu bahukalpaśatān /
S04bsu034_u:3845: bhaṇatī guṇānna ca guṇeṣu sthito na sa budhyate paramabodhigirām //
S04bsu034_u:3846: SRS_29.46 bhavathā sadāpi akhilā madhurā sada śuddhaśīla suprasannamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3847: pariśuddhaśīla bhavathā satataṃ nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3848: SRS_29.47 na karotha māna na janetha khilaṃ pariśuddhamānasa sadā bhavathā /
S04bsu034_u:3849: mada māna mrakṣa vijahitva tataḥ pratilapsyathā imu samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3850: SRS_29.48 guṇato anusmari jinaṃ satataṃ varakāñcanacchaviprabhāsakaram /
S04bsu034_u:3851: gaganaṃ ca rātriya nakṣatrasphuṭaṃ tatha kāyu lakṣaṇasphuṭo munino //
S04bsu034_u:3853: pūjāṃ karotha sugatasya sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3854: vara gandhamālyakusumā rucirāṃ vāditra tūrya pragṛhīta bahu /
S04bsu034_u:3855: SRS_29.50 vara gandhamālyakusumā rucirāṃ vāditra tūrya pragṛhīta bahu /
S04bsu034_u:3857: jinastūpi pūja prakarotha sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3860: SRS_29.52 kāretha buddhapratimāṃ rucirāṃ ratanāmayīṃ suparikarmakṛtām /
S04bsu034_u:3862: SRS_29.53 vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim /
S04bsu034_u:3863: advitīya khaṅgasama bhotha sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3864: SRS_29.54 ahu dharmasvāmi mama yūyu sutā anuśikṣathā mama samādhicarim /
S04bsu034_u:3865: ahu so abhūṣi diśatā suviśruto dṛḍhadattu nāma manujādhipatiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3866: SRS_29.55 maya buddha pūjita ananta pure maya śīlu rakṣitu viśuddhamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3867: maya gauravaṃ daśabaleṣu kṛtaṃ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3868: SRS_29.56 maya putra dāra parityakta pure śirahastapādanayanāgravarāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3869: na ca līnacittata kadāci kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3870: SRS_29.57 dhanadhānya dāsa bahudāsiśatā ratanā prabhūta parityakta mayā /
S04bsu034_u:3871: saṃtarpitā pi bahuyācanakā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3872: SRS_29.58 maya mukti sphāṭika suvarṇa bahu vaidūrya śaṅkha śila tyakta pure /
S04bsu034_u:3873: maṇi śuddharūpiya pravāla ghanā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3874: SRS_29.59 maya tyakta ābharaṇa nānavidhā varamuktahāra tatha sīhanukāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3875: ratanāna jālika viśiṣṭa pṛthu imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3876: SRS_29.60 maya vastrakoṭya paramā sukhumāḥ pariśuddha kāśikadukūlavarāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3877: bahuhemacitra parityakta pare imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3878: SRS_29.61 maya hasti aśva ratha nānavidhāḥ parityakta svapriyasuto mahilāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3879: na ca daurmanasyata kadāci kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3880: SRS_29.62 maya dṛṣṭva pūrvi sudaridra narāḥ paryeṣṭiduḥkhita ca kṛcchragatāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3881: maya te dhanena adaridra kṛtāḥ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3883: dattā mayā yācanakāna purā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3884: udyāna koṭinayutā bahavaḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā /
S04bsu034_u:3885: SRS_29.64 udyāna koṭinayutā bahavaḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā /
S04bsu034_u:3887: harṣetva mānasu janitva kṛpāṃ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3888: SRS_29.65 grāmātha rāṣṭranagarā nigamāḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā /
S04bsu034_u:3889: datvā ca prītimanubhomi sadā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3890: SRS_29.66 ratanāna rāśaya sumerusamāstatha cīvarābharaṇakāśca bahu /
S04bsu034_u:3891: ye datta pūrvi maya yācanake imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3892: SRS_29.67 sudaridra sattva kṛta āḍhya mayā parikṛcchraprāpta paritrāta bahu /
S04bsu034_u:3893: bahuduḥkhapadruta sukhī mi kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3894: SRS_29.68 yada āsi īścaru mahīya ahaṃ dukhitāṃ ca paśyami bahuṃ janatām /
S04bsu034_u:3895: utsṛṣṭa teṣu maya rājyamabhūt kṛpa saṃjanetva sukhito ca yathā //
S04bsu034_u:3896: SRS_29.69 ye me kumāra kṛta āścariyā kṛta duṣkarāṇi bahu kalpaśatā /
S04bsu034_u:3897: na ca te maya kṣapaṇa śakya siyā kalpāna koṭinayutā bhaṇataḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3898: SRS_29.70 unmattacittabhūmi gacchi narā / aśraddadhanta sugatasya carim /
S04bsu034_u:3899: kṛta ye mi duṣkara tadāścariyā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3900: SRS_29.71 ārocayāmi ca kumāra idaṃ śraddadhanta me avitathaṃ vacanam /
S04bsu034_u:3901: na hi vāca bhāṣati mṛṣāṃ sugataḥ sada satyavādi jinu kāruṇikaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3902: SRS_29.72 anye ime 'pi ca prakāra bahū caratā śodhita ya kalpaśatāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3903: kathamahaṃ labhitvimu samādhivaraṃ moceya sattvaniyutāṃ dukhitām //
S04bsu034_u:3904: SRS_29.73 yasmin kṣaṇe ayu samādhi mayā pratilabdha bhūta mahājñānapathaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3905: so 'haṃ labhitvimu samādhivaraṃ paśyāmi buddhanayutān subahūn //
S04bsu034_u:3906: SRS_29.74 ṛddhī ananta pratilabdha mayā sa vikurvamāṇu vraji kṣetraśatān /
S04bsu034_u:3907: gatvā ca pṛcchi ahu kāruṇikān praśnāna koṭiniyutāna bahum //
S04bsu034_u:3908: SRS_29.75 yaścaiva bhāṣi mama te sugatā praśnāna koṭiniyutāna tadā /
S04bsu034_u:3909: gṛhṇitva sarvamahu dhārayamī na ca bhraśyate ekapadaṃ pi mamā //
S04bsu034_u:3910: SRS_29.76 taṃ co śruṇitva ahu bhūtanayaṃ praśnāna koṭinayutāna bahum /
S04bsu034_u:3911: deśitva taṃ viraja śāntapadaṃ sthāpemi sattva bahu jñānapathe //
S04bsu034_u:3912: SRS_29.77 asmin samādhiya sthihitva mayā śikṣitva bhūtanaya kalpaśatān /
S04bsu034_u:3913: bahusattvakoṭinayutāni purā ye sthāpitā viraji mārgavare //
S04bsu034_u:3914: SRS_29.78 yehī na dṛṣṭa purimā sugatā bhāṣantakā imu nayaṃ virajam /
S04bsu034_u:3915: tehī na śakyamiha śraddadhituṃ paramārthaśūnyata samādhivaram //
S04bsu034_u:3916: ye śrāddha paṇḍita vidhijña narā gambhīrabhūtanayalabdhanayāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3917: SRS_29.79 ye śrāddha paṇḍita vidhijña narā gambhīrabhūtanayalabdhanayāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3919: te nā trasanti na ca saṃtrasiṣū śrutvā ca bhonti sada āttamanāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3920: SRS_29.80 te te dharenti varabodhi samā te te hi putra anujāta mamā /
S04bsu034_u:3921: te te hyudumbarakusumasamāsteṣārtha haṃ caritu kalpaśatān //
S04bsu034_u:3922: SRS_29.81 na pi tasya asti vinipātabhayaṃ aṣṭākṣaṇā vigata tasya sadā /
S04bsu034_u:3923: drakṣyanti buddhanayutān subahūn imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3924: SRS_29.82 yatha maitrako jinu anantayaśāḥ sattvāna bheṣyi bahu arthakaraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3926: SRS_29.83 smṛtimān sa bhoti matimān jñānodgataḥ śrutidharo bhavati /
S04bsu034_u:3927: pratibhānu tasya bhavati vipulaṃ imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3928: SRS_29.84 devānāṃ ca sa bhavati pūjaniyo marutāṃ ca sada namasyanīyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3929: abhirakṣitaḥ satata devagaṇaiḥ imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayati //
S04bsu034_u:3930: SRS_29.85 na ca so 'gnimadhye mriyate na jale na ca tasya śastra kramate na viṣam /
S04bsu034_u:3931: na ca vairiṇāṃ gamaniyo bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3932: SRS_29.86 vanakandare vasatu tasya sadā marutā karonti vara pāricarim /
S04bsu034_u:3933: upasthāyakāśca bahu yakṣaśatā imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3934: SRS_29.87 jñānena sāgarasamo bhavatī na sajjate guṇa bhaṇantu muneḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3935: bhūtāṃśca buddhaguṇa kīrtayate imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3936: SRS_29.88 nānto na cāsya paryantu śrute na pramāṇu labhyati yathā gagane /
S04bsu034_u:3937: jñānolkadhāri timiraṃ harati imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3938: SRS_29.89 snigdhaṃ suyukta sada muñca girāṃ parṣatsu bhāṣati supremaṇiyām /
S04bsu034_u:3939: siṃho yathā sa vinadaṃ bhaṇatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3940: SRS_29.90 vaidyo bhiṣaku samu so bhavatī gati lenu trāṇa śaraṇaṃ bahūnām /
S04bsu034_u:3941: ālokabhūtu jagi so bhavati imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3942: SRS_29.91 na ca tasya maithuni mano ramate śamathe rataḥ spṛśati dhyānasukham /
S04bsu034_u:3943: śāntāṃ sa bhāṣati praśānta giram imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3944: SRS_29.92 na ca tasya mānasu nimittarataṃ sarve vibhāvita nimitta pṛthu /
S04bsu034_u:3945: satataṃ samāhitu vidū bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3946: SRS_29.93 cakṣuśca so labhati aprākṛtakaṃ yeno sa paśyati anantajinān /
S04bsu034_u:3947: so 'nantacakṣurbhavati vṛṣabho imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3949: saṃgītiyuktasvaru mañjugiro imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3950: SRS_29.95 meghābhigarjitasvaro bhavatī haṃsasvaro ravati mañjugiraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3951: pañcasvarāṅgaśatayuktasvaro imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3953: acintiyā sa gira niścaratī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3954: SRS_29.97 na ca bhojane bhavati gṛdhnumanā na pātracīvararato bhavatī /
S04bsu034_u:3955: alpecchu saṃtuṣṭa susaṃlikhito imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3956: SRS_29.98 na ca ātma utkarṣaku so bhavatī na parasya bhāṣati avarṇu kvacit /
S04bsu034_u:3957: dhyāne rataḥ sukhumacittu sadā imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3958: SRS_29.99 ātmānuprekṣī satataṃ bhavatī na parasya skhalitemeṣati ca /
S04bsu034_u:3959: aviruddhu sarvi jagi so bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3960: SRS_29.100 akiliṣṭacittu pariśuddhacarī aśaṭho avañcaku sadā bhavatī /
S04bsu034_u:3961: sadamārdavaḥ sada vimokṣarato imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3962: SRS_29.101 tyāgādhimukta satataṃ bhavatī mātsaryacittu na ca tasya ratam /
S04bsu034_u:3963: śīlenupetu satataṃ bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3965: SRS_29.102 abhirūpa darśaniyu premaṇiyo varakāñcanacchavi prabhāsakaraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3967: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharo bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3968: SRS_29.103 prāsādikaśca sada so bhavatī abhilakṣito bahujanasya priyo /
S04bsu034_u:3969: prekṣanta tṛpti na labhanti narā imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3970: SRS_29.104 devāsya nāga tatha yakṣagaṇāstuṣṭā udagrāḥ sada āttamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3971: bhāṣanti varṇa praviśitva kulānimu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3972: SRS_29.105 brahmā ca śakra vaśavarti vahu upasthānu tasya prakaronti sadā /
S04bsu034_u:3973: na ca tasya unnata mano bhavatī / imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3974: SRS_29.106 na ca tasya durgatibhayaṃ bhavatī na pi cākṣaṇā na vinipātabhayam /
S04bsu034_u:3975: parimuktu sarvavinipātabhayādimu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3976: SRS_29.107 na ca tasya kāṅkṣa vimatirbhavatī vara buddhadharma śruṇiyā nipuṇān /
S04bsu034_u:3977: gambhīrajñānānugato bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3978: SRS_29.108 yaṃ yaṃ pi dharmaṃ śruṇatī sukhumaṃ sarvatra bhoti vaśi pāragataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3979: balavantu hetunipuṇo bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3980: SRS_29.109 evaṃ prabhāṣita jinena girā ahu tena bhomi paricīrṇa sadā /
S04bsu034_u:3981: labhate ca dhāraṇi viśiṣṭa varāmimu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3982: kālakriyāṃ ca sa karoti yadā amitābhu tasya purataḥ sthihatī /
S04bsu034_u:3983: SRS_29.110 kālakriyāṃ ca sa karoti yadā amitābhu tasya purataḥ sthihatī /
S04bsu034_u:3985: bhikṣugaṇena saha kāruṇiko imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3986: SRS_29.111 lābhī ca dhāraṇiya so bhavatī dharmanidhāna vaśipāragataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3987: pratibhānavānanācchedyagiro ya imaṃ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3988: SRS_29.112 yenaiva so vrajati dharmadharo ālokabhūta bhavatī jagataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3989: sipraśāntacara suviśuddhamanā imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3990: SRS_29.113 vara dharmakośa vividhaṃ nipuṇaṃ so dharmakāya vaśi pāragataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3991: so saṃśayaṃ chinatti sarvajage imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //
S04bsu034_u:3992: SRS_29.114 sarve 'pi sattva siya kāruṇikā bhagavān bhavāntakaraṇe sugataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3993: tān satkareyyā bahu kalpaśatān yatha gaṅgavāluka tathottari vā //
S04bsu034_u:3994: SRS_29.115 yaścaiva paści kṣayakāli imaṃ śrutvā samādhimiha kaści naraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3995: anumodamīti bhaṇataikagiraṃ kala puṇyaskandha na sa pūrva bhavet //
S04bsu034_u:3996: SRS_29.116 yasyo kumāra iya śāntagatī paramārthaśūnyata samādhivaro /
S04bsu034_u:3997: prāvartu bhoti tatha pustagataḥ so dharmabhāṇaku sthitaḥ sumatiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4001_0: atha khalu bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi
S04bsu034_u:4001_1: kumāra ya ākāṅkṣed bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ - kimityahaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ rutamadhigaccheyamindriyāṇāṃ
S04bsu034_u:4002_0: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ samādhiḥ
S04bsu034_u:4002_1: śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo
S04bsu034_u:4003: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:4004: SRS_30.1 aparimita atīta nāyakāstena dṛṣṭāḥ puratu katha prayuktā pṛcchitā lokanāthāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4005: pravara kuśalamūle tiṣṭhato bodhisattvo imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan mokṣakāmaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4010: varṇu śruṇiya udāraṃ harṣu tasyo na bhoti
S04bsu034_u:4011: na pi ca punaravarṇe maṅkubhāvaṃ nigacchet /
S04bsu034_u:4014: SRS_30.4 akhilamadhuravāṇī ślakṣṇavācā suyuktā apagatabhrukuṭiśco pūrvaālāpi bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:4015: satatasmitamukhaśco śikṣito nāyakānām imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan mokṣakāmaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4016: SRS_30.5 bhavati sa sukhavāsaḥ sūrataḥ snigdhacitto bhavati sada sudānto dāntabhūmisthitaśca /
S04bsu034_u:4017: sumadhura priyavāṇī snigdhasatyābhidhāyī imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4018: na ca sa katha karotī vaigrahīṃ no vivādān apagatakhila doṣā varjitāstena śeṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4019: SRS_30.6 na ca sa katha karotī vaigrahīṃ no vivādān apagatakhila doṣā varjitāstena śeṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4021: pramuditu sada bhotī sūrato mārdavaśca imu viraja samādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4022: SRS_30.7 bhavati ca sada vidvāṃstyāgi nityābhiyuktaḥ sudukhita jana dṛṣṭvā teṣamannaṃ dadāti /
S04bsu034_u:4023: priyataru parityaktuṃ bhoti nityaṃ sudātā imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4024: SRS_30.8 devaśatasahasrāṇa spṛhāṃ ye saṃjanentī nāga asura yakṣā nityupasthāyakāsya /
S04bsu034_u:4025: vani pavani vasante rakṣa tasyā karontī imu viraja samādhiṃ yo naro dhārayati //
S04bsu034_u:4026: SRS_30.9 bhaṇi vacanamasaktaṃ brahmadhoṣasvaro 'sau haṃsaravitaghoṣaḥ kinnarodgītaghoṣaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4027: pañcaśatasvarāṅgo harṣaṇīyasvaraśco bhavati naditaśabdo ghuṣṭaśabdaḥ suśabdaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4028: SRS_30.10 yāvatatu pṛthu kṣatrāṇa naraḥ kaścideva sūkṣma raja kareyyā śakya te lakṣaṇāya /
S04bsu034_u:4029: tatu bahutaru tasyo ye svarā niścarantī imu viraja samādhiṃ yo naro dhārayāti //

S04bsu034_u:4034_0: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ samādhiḥ
S04bsu034_u:4034_1: śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavya uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyaḥ
S04bsu034_u:4034_2: araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4035: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:4036: SRS_31.1 tasyo rāgu na jātu kupyate na ca doṣo tasyo moha na jātu kupyate vṛṣabhisya /
S04bsu034_u:4037: teno sarvi kileśa cchoritānavaśeṣā yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4038: SRS_31.2 so 'sau śikṣa na jātu oṣirī sugatānāṃ so 'sau śūru na jātu istriyāṇāṃ vaśameti /
S04bsu034_u:4039: so 'sau śāsani prīti vindate sugatānāṃ yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4040: SRS_31.3 so 'sau jñānavidhijña paṇḍito matimāṃśca so 'sau buddha ananta paśyatī aparyantāṃ /
S04bsu034_u:4041: so 'sau dhāraṇijñānu jānatī aparyantaṃ yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī nayayuktim //
S04bsu034_u:4042: SRS_31.4 so 'sau neha cireṇa bheṣyati dvipadendraḥ so 'sau vaidyu bhiṣaku bheṣyate sukhadātā /
S04bsu034_u:4043: so 'sau uddhari śalya sarvaśo dukhitānāṃ yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4044: SRS_31.5 so 'sau āturu jñātva duḥkhitānimi sattvān so 'sau bherī sadā parāhanī amṛtasya /
S04bsu034_u:4045: so 'sau bheṣyati nāyako jino nacireṇa yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4046: SRS_31.6 so 'sau bhaiṣajyanayeṣu kovido varavaidyo ādiṃ jānati sarvavyādhināṃ yatra muktiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4047: so 'sau bhūtanayaśikṣito matimanto śikṣitvā bahusattva mocayī pṛthu naṣṭān //
S04bsu034_u:4048: SRS_31.7 so 'sau śūnyanayeṣu kovido matiśūraḥ so 'sau loki asaktu bhuñjati sada piṇḍam /
S04bsu034_u:4049: so 'sau bodhivarāya sthāpayi bahusattvān yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4050: SRS_31.8 so 'sau kṣāntibalena udgato naracandraḥ so 'sau loṣṭakadaṇḍatāḍito na ca kupyī /
S04bsu034_u:4051: so 'sau chidyatu aṅgamaṅgaśo na ca kṣubhye yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4052: SRS_31.9 so 'sau kṣāntibale pratiṣṭhito balavanto so 'sau kṣāntiya vastu tādṛśo supraśāntaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4053: so 'sau kṣāntibalena manyate matiśūro yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4054: SRS_31.10 so 'sau vastu na jātu manyate ahu cchinnā teno sarvi bhavā vibhāvitāḥ sada śūnyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4055: tasyo saṃjñā prahīṇa sarvaśo nikhileno yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4056: SRS_31.11 te te dharmasvabhāvu deśayī supraṇītaṃ te te bodhi spṛśī anuttarāṃ nacireṇa /
S04bsu034_u:4057: yeṣāṃ dharmasvabhāvu gocaraḥ sunidhyapto teṣāṃ datta ananta dakṣiṇā aparyantā //
S04bsu034_u:4058: SRS_31.12 so 'sau bhāṣati sūtrakoṭiyo aparyantā yatha gaṅganadīya vālikāstatu bhūyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4059: no cāsyu pratibhānu chidyate varṇamāne yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4060: so 'sau kalpasahasrakoṭiśo nayutāni jñāneno sada bhoti udgato yatha meruḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4062: dharma tasya kṣayo na vidyate bhaṇamāne yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4063: SRS_31.14 vistīrṇaṃ vipulaṃ acintiyaṃ pratibhānaṃ bhotī bodhivarāṃ gaveṣataḥ sada tasyo /
S04bsu034_u:4064: nityaṃ bhāṣati sūtrakoṭiyo aparyantā yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:4065: SRS_31.15 yaṃ caite dvipadottamā jinā bhaṇi dharmaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ ca śruṇitva gṛhṇatī paripūrṇam /
S04bsu034_u:4066: no vā ekapade 'pi vidyate vimatisyo yo 'sau sarvi abhāva jānatī imi dharmān //
S04bsu034_u:4067: SRS_31.16 so 'sau bhoti viśiṣṭa tyāgavān sada kālaṃ bhotī dānapatiḥ sukhaṃdado dukhitānām /
S04bsu034_u:4068: dṛṣṭā duḥkhita sattva tarpayī ratanehī yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam //
S04bsu034_u:4069: SRS_31.17 sau 'sau jambudhvaje bhaviṣyatī sada rājā sattvānāṃ sada saukhya kāhitī aparyantam /
S04bsu034_u:4070: maitrāye samupetu prāṇīnāṃ sada kāle yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam //
S04bsu034_u:4071: SRS_31.18 putrān dhītara dāsadāsiyo tyajya dhīro hastau pāda śirāṃsi sa tyajī tatha rājyam /
S04bsu034_u:4072: no cālīyati tasya mānasaṃ vṛṣabhisyo yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam //
S04bsu034_u:4073: SRS_31.19 aṅgāṅgaṃ puna tasya chidyatī yadi kāyo no tasya pratihanyate manaḥ supine 'pi /
S04bsu034_u:4074: teno pūjita bhonti nāyakā dvipadendrā yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam //
S04bsu034_u:4075: SRS_31.20 teno pūjita sarvi nāyakā ya atītāstatha pūjita ye anāgatā dvipadendrāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4076: tehī satkṛta sarvi nāyakā sthita ye co yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam //
S04bsu034_u:4077: SRS_31.21 so 'sau kośa dhareti paṇḍitaḥ sugatānāṃ so 'sau dhāraṇiye pratiṣṭhitaḥ paramāyām /
S04bsu034_u:4078: so 'sau bheṣyati lokanāyako naciareṇa yacchutvā imu sūtraṃ dhārayet kṣayakāle //
S04bsu034_u:4079: SRS_31.22 so 'ndho naiva kadāci bheṣyatī vidu jātu no co aṅgavihīnu bheṣyatī bahukalpān /
S04bsu034_u:4080: teno akṣaṇa aṣṭa varjitā imi nityaṃ yeno sūtramidaṃ prabhāṣitaṃ apramuṣṭam //
S04bsu034_u:4081: SRS_31.23 nāsau durgatiṣu gamiṣyati puna jātu nityaṃ lakṣaṇadhāri bheṣyatī abhirūpaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4082: pacco tasya abhijña bhāvitā imi nityaṃ purataḥ so sugatāna sthāsyatī sada śūraḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4083: SRS_31.24 bahukān nirmita nirmiṇitvāna ayu jñānī preṣatī bahukṣetrakoṭiṣu vinayārtham /
S04bsu034_u:4084: yehi dṛṣṭa bhavanti nirmitā bahu buddhāḥ tehī bodhivarāya sthāpitā bahu sattvāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4085: SRS_31.25 smṛtimantaḥ gatimantaḥ prajñāvān dhṛtimāṃśca sthāmnā vīryabalena so sadā samupetaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4086: dharmapāramiprāpta bheṣyati mahatejā yaḥ śrutvā imu sūtra dhārayet kṣayakāle //
S04bsu034_u:4087: SRS_31.26 raśmikoṭisahasra niścarī sada teṣāṃ vyomāḥ sarvi karonti maṇḍalāḥ suriyāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:4088: yehī bhāvita bhonti śūnyakā imi dharmāste te śūra bhavanti nāyakā nacireṇa //
S04bsu034_u:4089: eṣo gocaru śāntu bhāvito maya pūrvaṃ bahukalpāna sahasra koṭiyo niyutāni /
S04bsu034_u:4090: SRS_31.27 eṣo gocaru śāntu bhāvito maya pūrvaṃ bahukalpāna sahasra koṭiyo niyutāni /
S04bsu034_u:4092: vīryaṃ me na kadāci sahasita iha mārge yadahaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa vyākṛto jinabhūmī //
S04bsu034_u:4093: SRS_31.28 yūyaṃ pī mama caryā śikṣathā iha sūtre gambhīrā paramārtha deśitā iya netrī /
S04bsu034_u:4094: yatrāmī bahu naṣṭa tīrthikā viparitā kṣiptvā bodhimapāyi bhairave prapatanti //
S04bsu034_u:4095: SRS_31.29 bahukalpāna sahasrakoṭiyo nayutāni veditvā amu tatra vedanā kaṭu tībrāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4096: bahukalpā nayutānamatyayāt punareva hetuḥ so amṛtasya prāptaye bhaviṣyate //
S04bsu034_u:4097: SRS_31.30 ye te paścimi kāli bhairave sugatasyo rakṣanti imu sūtramīdṛśaṃ praśāntam /
S04bsu034_u:4098: teṣāṃ bodhi varā na durlabhā iya śreṣṭhā te te paścimi kāli vyākṛta dhari dharmān //
S04bsu034_u:4102_0: atha khalu bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi
S04bsu034_u:4102_1: kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahābhijñāparikarma dhārayitukāmenāyaṃ samādhirdhārayitavyaḥ
S04bsu034_u:4102_2: udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ
S04bsu034_u:4105_1: apracāraḥ prajñāskandhasya vivekadarśanaṃ vimuktiskandhasya yathābhūtadarśanaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhasya
S04bsu034_u:4106: yayābhijñayā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasamādhivikurvitāni vikurvan sarvasattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu034_u:4108: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:4110: vivāde yastu carati sodgṛhṇan na vimucyate //
S04bsu034_u:4111: SRS_32.2 abhijñā tasya sā prajñā bauddhaṃ jñānamacintiyam /
S04bsu034_u:4112: udgrahe yaḥ sthito bhoti jñānaṃ tasya na vidyate //
S04bsu034_u:4113: SRS_32.3 bahavo 'cintiyā dharmā ye śabdena prakāśitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4115: SRS_32.4 saṃghābhāṣyamajānānaḥ kiṃ saṃghāya tu bhāṣitam /
S04bsu034_u:4117: SRS_32.5 lokadhātusahasreṣu ye mayā sūtra bhāṣitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4119: SRS_32.6 ekaṃ padārthaṃ cintetvā sarve te bhonti bhāvitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4121: SRS_32.7 nairātmyaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ ye narā arthakovidāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4122: asmin pade tu śikṣitvā buddhadharmā na durlabhāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4123: SRS_32.8 sarvadharmā buddhadharmā dharmatāyāṃ ya śikṣitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4124: ye dharmatāṃ prajānanti na virodhenti dharmatām //
S04bsu034_u:4125: SRS_32.9 sarvā vāg buddhavāgeva sarvaśabdo hyavastukaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4126: diśo daśa gaveṣitvā buddhavāg naiva labhyate //
S04bsu034_u:4127: SRS_32.10 eṣā vācā buddhavācā gaveṣitvā diśo daśa /
S04bsu034_u:4128: na labhyate 'nuttaraiṣā na labdhā na ca lapsyate //
S04bsu034_u:4131: SRS_32.12 aṇu notpadyate dharmo aṇuśabdena deśitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4132: aṇumātro na co labdho loke śabdena deśitaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4134: ya evaṃ dharma jānanti budhyante bodhimuttamām //
S04bsu034_u:4135: SRS_32.14 te buddhānuttarāṃ bodhiṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayī /
S04bsu034_u:4138: tena buddhā iti proktā buddhajñānā prabodhanāt //
S04bsu034_u:4141: SRS_32.17 cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇaṃ ca jihvā kāyo manastathā /
S04bsu034_u:4143: SRS_32.18 etādṛśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ yaḥ prajānati /
S04bsu034_u:4144: nāsau vivādaṃ kurute jñātvā dharmāṇa lakṣaṇam //
S04bsu034_u:4145: SRS_32.19 eṣa gocaru śūrāṇāṃ bodhisattvāna tāyinām /
S04bsu034_u:4146: na te kadācit kāṅkṣanti jānante dharmaśūnyatām //
S04bsu034_u:4147: SRS_32.20 dharmasvabhāvaṃ jānāti buddhastenocyate hi saḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4149: SRS_32.21 satkṛto buddhaśabdena śīlaśabdena so kṛtaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4151: SRS_32.22 yāvantaḥ kīrtitāḥ śabdā hīna utkṛṣṭamadhyamāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4153: SRS_32.23 na buddhadharmā deśasthā na pradeśastha kīrtitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4154: na cotpannā niruddhā va ekatvena pṛthak tathā //
S04bsu034_u:4155: SRS_32.24 na te navāḥ purāṇā vā na teṣāmasti manyanā /
S04bsu034_u:4156: na ca nīlā na pītā va nāvadatā na lohitāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4157: SRS_32.25 anābhilāpyā agrāhyā evaṃ ghoṣeṇa deśitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4158: na ca ghoṣasya sā bhūmiḥ prātihāryaṃ muneridam //
S04bsu034_u:4159: SRS_32.26 anāsravā hi te dharmā- nena ucyanti hi /

S04bsu034_u:4163: SRS_32.28 na cāsau labhyate sattvo nirvṛtiryena sparśitā /

S04bsu034_u:4165: SRS_32.29 yathā candraśca sūryaśca kāṃsapātrīya dṛśyate /
S04bsu034_u:4166: na ca yāti svakaṃ bimbamevaṃ dharmāṇa lakṣaṇam //
S04bsu034_u:4167: SRS_32.30 pratibhāsopamā dharmā yairhi jñātā svabhāvataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4169: SRS_32.31 avigraho hyayaṃ dharmo vigraho nātra kaścana /
S04bsu034_u:4170: avigrahaśca yo dharma eṣa buddhasya vigrahaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4171: SRS_32.32 dharmakāyena paśyanti ye te paśyanti nāyakam /
S04bsu034_u:4174: imāṃ gatiṃ vijānīta śrāmaṇyena hi ye 'rthikāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4175: SRS_32.34 aprāpti prāpti nirdiṣṭā sattvānāṃ jñātva āśayam /

S04bsu034_u:4177: SRS_32.35 yasya bhoti mayā prāptamaprāptaṃ tena cocyate /

S04bsu034_u:4181: SRS_32.37 avastukāḥ pañca skandhā abhūtvā eta utthitāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:4184: tallakṣaṇāste nirdiṣṭā lakṣaṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
S04bsu034_u:4187: SRS_32.40 agrāhyaṃ gaganaṃ proktaṃ grāhyamatra na labhyate /

S04bsu034_u:4191: SRS_32.42 asvabhāvā ime dharmāḥ svabhāvaiṣāṃ na labhyate /
S04bsu034_u:4192: yogināṃ gocaro hyeṣa ye yuktā buddhabodhaye //
S04bsu034_u:4193: SRS_32.43 ya evaṃ jānāti dharmān sa na dharmeṣu sajjate /
S04bsu034_u:4197: SRS_32.45 amanyamānā hi sā koṭī kalpetvā koṭi vyāhṛtā /

S04bsu034_u:4199: SRS_32.46 purimāṃ koṭi kalpitvā bālaḥ saṃsāri saṃsari /

S04bsu034_u:4201: SRS_32.47 śūnyaṃ jñātvā ca saṃsāraṃ bodhisattvo na sajjate /

S04bsu034_u:4203: SRS_32.48 śakunānāṃ yathākāśe padaṃ teṣāṃ na labhyate /

S04bsu034_u:4207: SRS_32.50 alabdhilabdhirno manye labdhe labdhirna vidyate /
S04bsu034_u:4208: māyopamaṃ ca tajjñānaṃ na māyāyāṃ ca tat sthitam //
S04bsu034_u:4209: SRS_32.51 evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu bālabuddhiṃ vikalpayet /
S04bsu034_u:4211: SRS_32.52 jātijaropagāḥ sattvā jātisteṣāṃ na kṣīyate /
S04bsu034_u:4215: SRS_32.54 ayuktāḥ saṃprayuktāśca karmayogasmi te sthitāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:4217: SRS_32.55 karmaughe vahatāṃ teṣāṃ karma na kṣīyate sadā /
S04bsu034_u:4218: punaḥ punaśca mrīyante mārapakṣe sthitāḥ sadā //
S04bsu034_u:4219: SRS_32.56 mārābhibhūtā duṣprajñāḥ saṃkliṣṭena hi karmaṇā /
S04bsu034_u:4221: SRS_32.57 maraṇaṃ te nigacchanti andhā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:4225: SRS_32.59 putrā mahyaṃ dhanaṃ mahyaṃ bālabuddhīhi kalpitam /
S04bsu034_u:4226: asataṃ karma kalpitvā saṃsāro bhūyu vardhate //
S04bsu034_u:4228: pṛthak pṛthak ca gacchanti tena coktāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4230: na te mokṣaṃ labhiṣyanti mārasya vaśamāgatāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4231: SRS_32.62 kāmanāṃ kāraṇaṃ bālāḥ striyaṃ sevanti pūtikām /

S04bsu034_u:4233: SRS_32.63 kāmānna buddhā varṇenti nāpi strīṇāṃ niṣevaṇam /
S04bsu034_u:4236: na viśvasanti istrīṇāṃ naiṣa mārgo hi bodhaye //
S04bsu034_u:4238: bhāvayitvā ca taṃ mārgaṃ bhonti buddhā anuttarāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4239: SRS_32.66 anuttarāśca te yuktā bhonti lokasya cetiyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4241: SRS_32.67 poṣadhaṃ ca niṣevanti śīlaskandhe samādapī /
S04bsu034_u:4251: SRS_32.72 kṣetrakoṭī prakampenti yathā gaṅgāya vālikā /
S04bsu034_u:4253: SRS_32.73 nirmiṇvanti ca te vṛkṣān ratanaiḥ suvicitritān /

S04bsu034_u:4258: pibanti ye tato vāri tisrastṛṣṇā jahanti te //
S04bsu034_u:4259: SRS_32.76 avivartyāśca te bhonti pītvā vāri niruttaram /
S04bsu034_u:4261: SRS_32.77 anuttarāṃ gatiṃ śāntāṃ gacchantīti vijānatha /

S04bsu034_u:4267: SRS_32.80 ye ceha dharme kāṅkṣanti evaṃ gambhīri durdṛśe /

S04bsu034_u:4285: SRS_32.89 pūrvāntamaparāntaṃ ca pratyutpannaṃ ca paśyati /
S04bsu034_u:4286: evaṃ ca deśitā dharmā na cātra kiṃci deśitam //

S04bsu034_u:4297: SRS_32.95 kasyeyaṃ saṃjñā utpannā kena saṃjñā utpāditā /
S04bsu034_u:4298: kena sā sparśitā saṃjñā kena saṃjñā nirodhitā //
S04bsu034_u:4299: SRS_32.96 dharmo na labdho buddhena yasya saṃjñā utpadyate /

S04bsu034_u:4309: SRS_32.101 yathā sattvāstathā cintā yathā cintā tathā jināḥ /

S04bsu034_u:4323: SRS_32.108 ghoṣo vākpatha vijñaptiḥ kṣayaśabdena deśitā /

S04bsu034_u:4327: SRS_32.110 sarvabhāvān vibhāvitvā abhāve ye pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4328: na cānyo darśito bhāvo nābhāvo 'nyo nidarśitaḥ //

S04bsu034_u:4331: SRS_32.112 yo bhāvaḥ sarvabhāvānāmabhāva eṣa darśitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4332: evaṃ bhāvān vijānitvā abhāvo bhoti darśitaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4333: SRS_32.113 nāsau sparśayituṃ śakyamabhāvo jātu kenacit /
S04bsu034_u:4335: SRS_32.114 ahaṃ buddho bhavelloke yasyaiṣā ho matirbhavet /
S04bsu034_u:4336: na jātu bhavatṛṣṇārto bodhiṃ budhyeta paṇḍitaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4337: SRS_32.115 na kaṃci dharmaṃ prārtheti bodhisattvaḥ samāhitaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:4341: SRS_32.117 śabdena deśitā dharmāḥ sarve saṃskāra śūnyakāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4342: yaśva svabhāvaḥ śabdasya gambhīraḥ sūkṣma durdṛśaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4343: SRS_32.118 mahābhijñāya nirdeśa idaṃ sūtraṃ pravuccati /
S04bsu034_u:4355: SRS_32.124 bhāvanāmayi ṛddhīye ye sthitā buddhaśrāvakāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4357: SRS_32.125 na teṣāṃ sarvadevebhirāśayaḥ śakyu jānitum /

S04bsu034_u:4359: SRS_32.126 na teṣāmasti khālityaṃ na caiva palitaṃ śire /
S04bsu034_u:4360: audārikā jarā nāsti na duḥkhamaraṇaṃ tathā //
S04bsu034_u:4361: SRS_32.127 saṃśayo vimatirnāsti kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu034_u:4367: SRS_32.130 strīsaṃjñā puruṣasaṃjñā ca sarvasaṃjñā vibhāvitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4373: SRS_32.133 sulabdhaṃ tena mānuṣyaṃ prahīṇāḥ sarvi akṣaṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4375: SRS_32.134 kalpā acintiyāstehi ye saṃsārāttu choritāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4377: SRS_32.135 dṛṣṭāste sarvabuddhehi taiste buddhāśca satkṛtāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4378: kṣipraṃ ca bodhiṃ prāpsyanti teṣāṃ sūtramidaṃ priyam //
S04bsu034_u:4379: SRS_32.136 na teṣāṃ kāṅkṣa vimatī sarvadharmeṣu bheṣyatī /

S04bsu034_u:4383: SRS_32.138 dṛṣṭvā maitreya saṃbuddhaṃ lapsyante kṣānti bhadrikām /
S04bsu034_u:4386: acintiyāyāṃ koṭīye kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate //
S04bsu034_u:4387: SRS_32.140 na teṣāṃ vidyate kāṅkṣā aṇūmātrāpi sarvaśaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4389: SRS_32.141 caratāṃ duṣkaraṃ caiva kṣayakāle subhairave /
S04bsu034_u:4391: SRS_32.142 idaṃ sūtraṃ priyaṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ gañjarakṣakāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4393: SRS_32.143 na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ jñānaṃ buddhajñānamacintiyam /
S04bsu034_u:4397: SRS_32.145 te te nādaṃ nadiṣyanti buddhānāṃ kṣetrakoṭiṣu /
S04bsu034_u:4401: SRS_32.147 te te vyākṛta buddhena ikṣvākukulasaṃbhavāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:4411: SRS_32.152 ye ca śṛṇvanti taṃ śabdaṃ sattvakoṭyo acintiyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4413: SRS_32.153 teṣāṃ ca buddhakoṭīnāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣantyacintiyam /
S04bsu034_u:4415: SRS_32.154 ye ca śṛṇvanti taṃ śabdaṃ teṣāṃ saṃjñā nirudhyate /
S04bsu034_u:4419: SRS_32.156 guṇānuśaṃsā ityete yā labhante ha paṇḍitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4421: SRS_32.157 mātṛgrāmo 'pidaṃ sūtraṃ śrutvā gāthāpi dhārayet /
S04bsu034_u:4423: SRS_32.158 na sā puno 'pi strībhāvamitaḥ paścād grahīṣyati /
S04bsu034_u:4425: SRS_32.159 śreṣṭhe 'tha iha sūtrasmin guṇāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4426: te 'sya sarve bhaviṣyanti kṣipraṃ bodhiṃ ca prāpsyate //
S04bsu034_u:4427: SRS_32.160 viśāradaśca so nityaṃ bhoti sarvāsu jātiṣu /
S04bsu034_u:4429: SRS_32.161 janako bodhisattvānāṃ samādhiḥ śānta bhāṣitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4430: ya icched buddhituṃ bodhimidaṃ sūtraṃ pravartayet //
S04bsu034_u:4433: SRS_32.163 iha bodhīya te śūrā bodhisattvāḥ sthitāḥ sadā /
S04bsu034_u:4438: sa labhitva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4447: SRS_32.167 śūnyānimittaṃ paramapraṇītu śāntaṃ dharma praśāntaṃ cara nipuṇaṃ asaṅgam /
S04bsu034_u:4448: svabhāvaśūnyaṃ sada virajaṃ praśāntaṃ samādhiprāptyā bahu jani saṃprakāśayī //
S04bsu034_u:4450: gambhīra śāntaṃ labhiya imaṃ samādhimālokaprāpto bhaviṣyati sarvalokaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4451: SRS_32.169 śuciśca nityaṃ bhaviṣyati brahmacārī sa nirāmagandhaḥ satatamasaṃkiliṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4452: anyāṃśca tatra sthapiṣyati sattvakoṭayo labdhvā praśāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4453: SRS_32.170 sa sutīkṣṇaprajño bhaviṣyati śreṣṭhaprajñaḥ śrutisāgaro 'sau nityamanantabuddhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4454: kalyāṇavākyo matikuśalo vidhijño dhāritva śāntiṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4455: SRS_32.171 ye karmasthānā tathariva śilpasthānā bhaiṣajyasthānāstathariva auṣadhīnām /
S04bsu034_u:4456: sarvatra dhīro bhaviṣyati pāraprāpto dhāritva sūtraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4457: SRS_32.172 kāvyeṣu śāstreṣu tathapi ca hāsyalāsye nṛtye 'tha gīte sukuśala pāraprāptaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4458: ācāryu loke bhaviṣyati nityakālaṃ dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4459: SRS_32.173 parivāravān so bhaviṣyati nityakālaṃ sa abhedyapakṣaḥ sada sahitaḥ samagraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4460: caramāṇu śreṣṭhāṃ varāṃ śiva bodhicaryāṃ dhāritva sūtraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4461: SRS_32.174 śokātha śalyā tathariva cittapīḍā no tasya jātu bhaviṣyati paṇḍitasya /
S04bsu034_u:4462: ārogyaprāpto bhaviṣyati sarvakālaṃ dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4463: SRS_32.175 ye kāyaśūlāstathariva cittaśūlāḥ ye dantaśūlāstathapi ca śīrṣaśūlāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4464: no tasya bhontī vyādhayu jīvaloke dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4465: SRS_32.176 yāvanta rogā bahuvidha martaloke ye kāyarogāstathariva cittarogāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4466: te tasya rogāḥ satata na jātu bhonti dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4467: SRS_32.177 cittasya vā ye bahuvidhu yatkileśāḥ kāye vāpi bahuvidha rogajātāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4468: te tasya nāstī bahuvidha saṃkileśā dhāritva śāntaṃ imu viraja samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4469: yathantarīkṣaṃ gaganamanopaliptaṃ prakṛtiviśuddhaṃ vimala prabhāsvaraṃ ca /
S04bsu034_u:4470: SRS_32.178 yathantarīkṣaṃ gaganamanopaliptaṃ prakṛtiviśuddhaṃ vimala prabhāsvaraṃ ca /
S04bsu034_u:4472: cittaṃ tathaiva bhavati viśuddha tasyo dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4473: SRS_32.179 candrasya ābhā tathariva sūryaābhā śuddhā agrāhyā bhavati prabhāsvarāśca /
S04bsu034_u:4474: cittaṃ tathaiva bhavati prabhāsvaraṃ ca dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4475: SRS_32.180 yatha antarīkṣaṃ na sukaru citraṇāya raṅgān gṛhītvā bahuvidha naikarūpān /
S04bsu034_u:4476: cittaṃ tathaiva na sukaru citrituṃ sevetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:4477: SRS_32.181 vāto yathaiva caturdiśa vāyamāno asajjamāno vrajati diśaḥ samantāt /
S04bsu034_u:4478: vātasamānā bhavati sa cittadhārā jagi so asakto vrajati anopaliptaḥ //

S04bsu034_u:5689: deśayi śānta samādhi narendrastatrimi arthapadāni śṛṇotha //

S04bsu034_u:5692: SRS_37.18 āditu śūnya anāgata dharmā nāgata asthita sthānavimuktāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:5694: SRS_37.19 naiva ca nīla na pita na śvetā nāmatu riktaku ghoṣasvabhāvāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:5697: SRS_37.20 bhāṣatu akṣaru saṃkramu nāsti no pi abhāṣatu saṃkaru bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:5699: nāpi ca akṣara deśa vrajantī no punarakṣaru krānti kutaścit //
S04bsu034_u:5700: SRS_37.21 akṣara akṣaya kṣīṇa niruddhā bhāṣatato va abhāṣatato vā /

S04bsu034_u:5702: SRS_37.22 buddhasahasraśatā ya atītā dharmasahasraśatāni bhaṇitvā /

S04bsu034_u:5704: SRS_37.23 yena prajānati akṣayadharmān nityu prajānati akṣayadharmān /

S04bsu034_u:5706: SRS_37.24 yaṃ ca prabhāṣati dharma jinasyo taṃ ca na manyati so 'kṣayatāye /
S04bsu034_u:5707: ādi nirātmani ye tvimi dharmā tāṃśca prabhāṣati no ca kṣapeti //
S04bsu034_u:5708: SRS_37.25 sarvagiraḥ sa prabhāṣati vijño no ca girāya harīyati cittam /
S04bsu034_u:5709: sarvagiro girighoṣanikāśo tena na sajjati jātu girāye //
S04bsu034_u:5710: SRS_37.26 yāya girāya sa kīrtitu dharmaḥ sā gira tatkṣaṇi sarva niruddhā /
S04bsu034_u:5711: yādṛśu lakṣaṇu tasya girāye sarvimi dharma tallakṣaṇaprāptāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5712: SRS_37.27 sarvimi dharma alakṣa vilakṣā sarvi alakṣaṇa lakṣaṇaśuddhāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5713: nitya vivikta viśuddha nabho vā saṃkhya samāsatu te na upenti //
S04bsu034_u:5714: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛta sarvi viviktā nāsti vikalpana teṣamṛṣīṇām /
S04bsu034_u:5715: SRS_37.28 saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛta sarvi viviktā nāsti vikalpana teṣamṛṣīṇām /
S04bsu034_u:5717: sarvagatīṣu asaṃskṛta prāptā dṛṣṭigatehi sadaiva viviktāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5718: SRS_37.29 nityamarakta aduṣṭa amūḍhāstasya svabhāva samāhitacittāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5719: eṣa samādhibalī balavanto yo imu jānati īdṛśa dharmān //
S04bsu034_u:5720: SRS_37.30 śailaguhāgiridurganadīṣu yadva pratiśrutka jāyi pratītya /
S04bsu034_u:5721: evimu saṃskṛti sarvi vijāne māyamarīcisamaṃ jagu sarvam //
S04bsu034_u:5722: SRS_37.31 prajñabalaṃ guṇa dharmagatānāṃ jñānabalena abhijña ṛṣīṇām /
S04bsu034_u:5723: vāca upāyakuśalya niruktā yatra prakāśitu śānta samādhiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5724: SRS_37.32 kalpitu vuccati kalpanamātraṃ antu na labhyati saṃsaramāṇe /
S04bsu034_u:5725: koṭi alakṣaṇa yā puri āsīdapi anāgati pratyayatāye //
S04bsu034_u:5726: SRS_37.33 karma kriyāya ca vartati evaṃ hīna utkṛṣṭatayā samudenti /
S04bsu034_u:5727: vivikta dharma sadā prakṛtīye śūnya nirātma vijānatha sarvān //
S04bsu034_u:5728: SRS_37.34 saṃvṛti bhāṣitu dharma jinenāsaṃskṛtasaṃskṛta paśyatha evam /
S04bsu034_u:5729: nāstiha bhūtatu ātma naro vā etaku lakṣaṇa sarvajagasya //
S04bsu034_u:5730: SRS_37.35 kṛṣṇāśubha ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam /

S04bsu034_u:5732: SRS_37.36 sarvi bhavā alikā vaśikāśco riktaku tuccha phenasamāśca /
S04bsu034_u:5733: māyamarīcisamāḥ sada śunyā deśitu śabditu te ca viviktāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5734: SRS_37.37 evaṃ vijānatu manyana nāstī śīlavu bhotī aniśritacittaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5735: kṣāntibalena na kalpayi kiṃci eva carantu samāhitu bhoti //
S04bsu034_u:5736: SRS_37.38 yāttaka dharma vijāni sa rājā tāttaka deśita tena jinena /
S04bsu034_u:5737: śrutva nṛpo imu dharma jinasyo saparivāru samādadi śikṣām //
S04bsu034_u:5738: SRS_37.39 rājasuto imu śrutva samādhiṃ āttamanā mudito bhaṇi vācam /
S04bsu034_u:5739: suṣṭhu subhāṣitu eṣa samādhī eṣa tavā caraṇeṣu patāmi //
S04bsu034_u:5740: SRS_37.40 tatra ca prāṇisahasra aśītiḥ śrutvimu dharmasvabhāva praṇītam /
S04bsu034_u:5741: bhūtu ayaṃ paramārtha nirdeśo te anutpattika kṣānti labhiṃsu //
S04bsu034_u:5742: SRS_37.41 nāsti upādu nirodhu narasyo evimi dharma sadā viviktāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5743: eva prajānatu no parihāṇi rāja labhī anutpattika kṣāntim //
S04bsu034_u:5744: SRS_37.42 rāja tadā vijahitvana rājyaṃ pravraji śāsani tasya jinasya /
S04bsu034_u:5745: te 'pyanu pravrajitāḥ suta rājñaḥ pañcaśatāni anūnaka sarve //
S04bsu034_u:5746: SRS_37.43 pravrajito yada rāja saputro anya tadā bahuprāṇisahasrāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5747: pravrajitāḥ sugatasya samīpe dharma gaveṣiyu tasya jinasya //
S04bsu034_u:5748: SRS_37.44 viṃśativarṣaśatān paripūrṇān dharma prakāśitu tena jinenā /
S04bsu034_u:5749: rāja saputraku tena janenā viṃśativarṣaśatā cari dharmam //
S04bsu034_u:5750: SRS_37.45 atha apareṇa punaḥ samayena so 'pi jinaḥ parinirvṛtu āsīt /
S04bsu034_u:5751: ye jinaśrāvaka te 'pi atītāḥ so 'pi ca dharmu parittaku āsīt //
S04bsu034_u:5752: SRS_37.46 tasya ca rājina putra abhūṣī puṇyamatī sada śrāddhu prasannaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5753: tasya ca bhikṣu kulopagu āsīt / so imu deśayi śānta samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:5754: SRS_37.47 so akhilo madhuro ca abhūṣī satkṛtu prāṇisahasraśatebhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5755: devata koṭiśatānyanubaddhā varṇa bhaṇanti kulān praviśitvā //
S04bsu034_u:5756: SRS_37.48 sa smṛtimān matimān gatimāṃśco suvratu sūratu śīlarataśca /
S04bsu034_u:5757: susvaru aparuṣa so madhuraśco dhātuṣu jñānavaśī varaprāptaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5758: SRS_37.49 cīvarakoṭiśatāna ca lābhī āsi sa bhikṣu yaśaḥprabhu nāmnā /
S04bsu034_u:5759: tasya ca puṇyabalaṃ asahantā bhikṣusahasra tadā jani īrṣām //
S04bsu034_u:5760: SRS_37.50 puṇyabalena ca rūpabalena jñānabalena ca ṛddhibalena /
S04bsu034_u:5763: SRS_37.51 hṛṣṭamanaśca priyaśca janasyo bhikṣu upāsakabhikṣuṇikānām /
S04bsu034_u:5766: SRS_37.52 yaśca sa rājinu putru abhūṣī puṇyamatī sada śrāddhu prasannaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5767: jñātva praduṣṭamanān bahubhikṣūṃ rakṣa sa kārayi ācariyasya //
S04bsu034_u:5769: tehi sadā parivārita bhikṣu bhāṣati bhūtacarīmaparyantām //
S04bsu034_u:5770: SRS_37.54 so pariṣāya prabhāṣati dharmaṃ śūnya nirātma nirjīvimi dharmāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5771: ye upalambhika ātmaniviṣṭāsteṣa na rocati yaṃ bhaṇi bhikṣuḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5772: SRS_37.55 utthitu bhikṣava śastra gṛhītvā yeṣa na rocati śūnyata śāntā /
S04bsu034_u:5773: eṣa adharma prabhāṣati bhikṣuḥ etu hanitva bhaviṣyati puṇyam //
S04bsu034_u:5774: SRS_37.56 dṛṣṭva ca śastra na bhāyati bhikṣuḥ śūnyaka dharmamanusmaramāṇaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5775: nāstiha sattva naro vāpahatyai kuḍyasamā imi riktaka dharmāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5776: SRS_37.57 bhikṣu karoti sa añjali mūrdhnā bhāṣati vāca namo 'stu jinānām /
S04bsu034_u:5777: yena satyenimi śūnyaka dharmā bhontimi śastra māndāravapuṣpāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5779: kampita medini savanaṣaṇḍā śastra te jāta māndāravapuṣpāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5780: SRS_37.59 bhikṣu abhūttada maṃkuśarīrā ye upalambhika śastragṛhītāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5781: bhūyu ya śakyupasaṃkramaṇāye trasya abhūt sumahādbhutajātāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5782: SRS_37.60 ye puna śrāddha prasanna munīndre yeṣiha rocati śunyata śāntā /
S04bsu034_u:5784: SRS_37.61 bhikṣu janitvana maitra sa teṣu sarvajanasya purasta bhaṇāti /
S04bsu034_u:5785: ye mayi sattva pradoṣa karontī teṣa kṛte na hu bodhi carāmi //
S04bsu034_u:5786: SRS_37.62 tena ca varṣa aśītiranūnā bhāṣita śūnyata koṣu jinānām /
S04bsu034_u:5787: bhikṣusahasra pratyarthika āsan ye ca nivārita rājasutena //
S04bsu034_u:5788: SRS_37.63 so 'pi tadā paribhūt abhūṣī tasya ca bhikṣu parīttaku āsan /
S04bsu034_u:5789: vācamaniṣṭa tadā śruṇamānaḥ kṣāntibalā cyuta no ca kadācit //

S04bsu034_u:5793: mā mama kinacidācariyasyo cetasi kiṃci kṛtaṃ amanāpam //
S04bsu034_u:5794: so avacī śṛṇu rājakumārā kṣāntibalena samudgata buddhāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5795: SRS_37.66 so avacī śṛṇu rājakumārā kṣāntibalena samudgata buddhāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5797: yena mi bhāṣita vācamaniṣṭāstasyimi antiki maitra udārā //
S04bsu034_u:5798: SRS_37.67 yena sa kalpasahasraśatāni kṣānti niṣevita pūrvabhaveṣu /
S04bsu034_u:5799: so ahu bhikṣu yaśaḥprabhu āsaṃ śākyamunirbhagavān bhaṇi vācam //
S04bsu034_u:5800: SRS_37.68 yena yaśaḥprabhu rakṣitu bhikṣuḥ puṇyamatī tada rājinu putraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5801: jātisahasra mamāsi sahāyaḥ so maya vyākṛtu maitraku buddhaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5802: SRS_37.69 yena gaṇeśvara pūjitu śāstā yena tu kārita śreṣṭha vihārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5803: pūrvamasau varapuṣpasunāmā so padumotturu āsi munīndraḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5804: SRS_37.70 eva mayā bahukalpa anantā dhārayitāmimu dharma jinānām /
S04bsu034_u:5805: kṣāntibalaṃ samudānita pūrve śratva kumāra mamā anuśikṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5806: SRS_37.71 nirvṛtimapyatha bheṣyati evaṃ paścimi kāli saddharmavilope /
S04bsu034_u:5807: bhikṣu va tīrthamateṣvabhiyuktā te mama dharma pratikṣipi śāntam //
S04bsu034_u:5808: SRS_37.72 unnata uddhata duṣṭa pragalbhā pāpasahāyaka bhojanalubdhāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5809: cīvarapātraratāḥ paṭalubdhāḥ lābhasaṃniśrita te kṣipi dharmam //
S04bsu034_u:5811: pravrajitā iha śāsani mahyaṃ te 'pi pratikṣipi śāntamu dharmam //
S04bsu034_u:5812: SRS_37.74 māramatena ca mohita sattvā rāgavaśānugatābhiniviṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5813: mohavaśena tu mohita bālā yeṣa na rocati śūnyata śāntā //
S04bsu034_u:5814: SRS_37.75 bhikṣu ca bhikṣuṇikā gṛhiṇaśco grāhita mohita pāpamatībhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5815: teṣa vaśānugatā sada bhūtvā paścimi kāli pratikṣipi bodhim //
S04bsu034_u:5816: SRS_37.76 śrutva kumāra imā mama vācaṃ bhikṣu araṇyakule vasi nityam /
S04bsu034_u:5817: yeṣiya rocati śūnyata śāntā tairayu dhāritu dharmu jinānām //
S04bsu034_u:5818: SRS_37.77 pravraji te mama śāsani caritva bhikṣu upasaṃpadapoṣadhakarmam /
S04bsu034_u:5819: bhuñjimu piṇḍamasaktā aduṣṭā ye imu dhārayiṣyanti samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:5820: SRS_37.78 jīvita kāya apekṣi prahāyā śūnyata bhāvayathā supraśāntām /
S04bsu034_u:5821: yuktaprayuktamanā ca bhavitvā seva araṇya sadā mṛgabhūtāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5822: SRS_37.79 nitya karotha ca pūja jinānāṃ chatradhvajarddhiyamālyavihāraiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5823: cetiya pūjayathā pratimānāṃ kṣipra labhiṣyatha etu samādhim //
S04bsu034_u:5824: SRS_37.80 stūpa karāpayathā sugatānāṃ hemavibhūṣita rūpiyaliptān /
S04bsu034_u:5825: pratima suniṣṭhita ratnavicitrā bodhinidhānu janitvana cittam //
S04bsu034_u:5826: yāvati pūja jagesmi praṇītā divyatha mānuṣikā ramaṇīyā /
S04bsu034_u:5827: SRS_37.81 yāvati pūja jagesmi praṇītā divyatha mānuṣikā ramaṇīyā /
S04bsu034_u:5829: sarva gaveṣiya buddha mahethā bodhinidhānu karitva pratijñām //
S04bsu034_u:5830: SRS_37.82 dharmata paśyatha sarvi narendrān yāvata santi daśa diśi loke /
S04bsu034_u:5831: dṛśyati nirvṛti sarvajinānāṃ dharmatayā sthita saṃmukha buddhāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5832: SRS_37.83 bhotha ca sarviṣu tyāgādhimuktāḥ śīlaviśuddhagatā sthiracittāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5833: kṣāntiratāḥ sada maitraratāśco sarvi prajānatha śūnyaka dharmān //
S04bsu034_u:5834: SRS_37.84 vīryu janetha alīna adīnāḥ dhyānaratāḥ pravivekaratāśca /
S04bsu034_u:5835: prajña prajānatha prajñaviśuddhiṃ bheṣyatha kāruṇikā nacireṇa //
S04bsu034_u:5836: SRS_37.85 rāgu śametha sadā aśubhā ye doṣu nigṛhṇatha kṣāntibalena /
S04bsu034_u:5837: mohu nigṛhṇatha prajñabalenā prāpsyatha bodhi jinānu praśastām //
S04bsu034_u:5838: SRS_37.86 kāyu vibhāvayathā yathā phenaṃ duḥkhamasāraku pūtidurgandham /
S04bsu034_u:5839: skandha prajānatha riktaka sarvāṃllapsyatha jñānamanuttaru kṣipram //
S04bsu034_u:5840: SRS_37.87 dṛṣṭi ma gṛhṇatha pāpika jātu ātma ayaṃ puruṣo atha jīvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5841: sarvi prajānatha śūnyaka dharmān kṣipra spṛśiṣyatha uttamabodhim //
S04bsu034_u:5842: SRS_37.88 lābha ma kurvatha gṛddho kadācit mā paritapyatha piṇḍalamabdhvā /
S04bsu034_u:5843: nindita śaṃsita mā khu calethā merusamāśca akampiya bhothā //
S04bsu034_u:5844: SRS_37.89 dharma gaveṣatha gauravajātāḥ śratva tadāpi ca tatpara bhotha /
S04bsu034_u:5845: tiṣṭhata gocari sarvajinānāṃ yāsyatha kṣipra sukhāvatikṣetram //
S04bsu034_u:5846: SRS_37.90 sarvajage samacitta bhavitvā apriya mā priya citta karotha /
S04bsu034_u:5847: mā na gaveṣatha lābhu yaśo vā kṣipra bhaviṣyatha buddha munīndrāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5848: SRS_37.91 buddhaguṇāṃśca prabhāṣatha nityaṃ bhūtaguṇehi niruktipadehi /
S04bsu034_u:5849: yān guṇa śrutviha sattva prasannāḥ buddhaguṇeṣu spṛhāṃ janayeyuḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5850: SRS_37.92 nitya sagaurava cācariyeṣu mātu pitustatha sarvajagasmin /
S04bsu034_u:5851: mā puna mānavaśānuga bhothā lapsyatha lakṣaṇa triṃśa duve ca //
S04bsu034_u:5852: SRS_37.93 saṃgaṇikāṃ vijahitva aśeṣāṃ nityu vivekaratāpi ca bhotha /
S04bsu034_u:5854: SRS_37.94 maitri niṣevi tathā karuṇāṃ co muditapekṣaratāḥ sada bhotha /
S04bsu034_u:5855: śāstuḥ praśāsanu paśyatha nityaṃ bheṣyatha kṣipra hitaṃkaru loke //
S04bsu034_u:5856: SRS_37.95 pāpaka mitra ma jātu bhajetha sevatha mitra ye bhonti udārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5857: yeṣiha rocati śūnyata śāntā ye abhiprasthitā uttamabodhim //
S04bsu034_u:5858: SRS_37.96 śrāvakabhūmi ma śikṣatha jātu mā ca spṛheṣyatha tatra carīye /
S04bsu034_u:5860: cittu ma riñcatha buddhaguṇeṣu kṣipra bhaviṣyatha buddha jinendrāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:5861: SRS_37.97 satya giraṃ sada bhāṣatha śuddhāṃ mā mṛṣa bhāṣatha mā paruṣāṃ ca /
S04bsu034_u:5862: nitya priyaṃ madhuraṃ ca bhaṇethā lapsyatha vāca lokācariyāṇām //
S04bsu034_u:5863: SRS_37.98 kāyi anarthika jīvita bhothā mātma utkarṣaka mā parapaṃsī /
S04bsu034_u:5865: SRS_37.99 śūnyavimokṣaratāḥ sada bhothā mā praṇidhāna karotha gatīṣu /
S04bsu034_u:5866: sarvanimitta vivarjya aśeṣāṃ bhotha sadā animittavihārī //

S04bsu034_u:6393: yadidaṃ dharmagatamanasikāratā yuktabhāṇitā kālajñatā yathābhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhūtaprakāśanatā //
S04bsu034_u:6419: [Vaidya_299] yadidaṃ bhavasamatikramaḥ, pareṣāṃ ca bhavasamatikramaṇāvatāraṇatā ca //
S04bsu034_u:6422: .... asatpuruṣavarjanatā? yadidaṃ upalambhikānāṃ kusīdānāṃ ca vivarjanatā //
S04bsu034_u:6423: .... dhyānābhiratiḥ? yadidaṃ kāmakaṇṭakavivarjanatā, dhyānānāmanutsarjanatā, prītyavijahatā ca //
S04bsu034_u:6427: yadidaṃ pañcasvabhijñāsu sthitvā durvijñeyānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśanatā //
S04bsu034_u:6433: .... lābhasatkārānādeyatā? yadidaṃ anutkaṇṭhatā ca viagatapāpecchatā ca //
S04bsu034_u:6443: .... pravrajitaiḥ sārdhamasaṃstavaḥ? yadidaṃ ayuktavivarjanatā ca yuktaparyeṣaṇatā ca //
S04bsu034_u:6455: yadidaṃ yathābhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prakāśanatā vyavasthāpanatā ca, upālambhānigrahaśca //
S04bsu034_u:6461: .... duḥśīlānāmanukampanā? yadidaṃ pareṣāmāpatteruddharaṇatā ca śīlapratiṣṭhāpanatā ca //
S04bsu034_u:6477: ....kuśalamūlapūrvaṃgamatā? yadidaṃ bodhau tīvracchandatā ca pareṣāṃ samutsāhanatā ca //
S04bsu034_u:6478: .... upāyakauśalyam? yadidaṃ pratideśanānumodanādhyeṣaṇā kuśalānāṃ ca pariṇāmanākauśalyam //
S04bsu034_u:6479: ....nimittaprahāṇam? yadidaṃ svapnopamānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ budhyanatā ca vastuvibhāvanatā
S04bsu034_u:6484: yadidaṃ yathābhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ upamāvadānaiḥ saṃprakāśanatā //
S04bsu034_u:6511: .... yogācārabhūmiḥ? yadidaṃ saptatriśatāṃ bodhipakṣikāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanā //
S04bsu034_u:6517: .... buddhabhūmiḥ? yadidaṃ sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratilābhitā //
S04bsu034_u:6523: .... bodhisattvaiḥ parigṛhītāḥ? yadidaṃ durlabhatā ca mahābhaiṣajyatā ca //
S04bsu034_u:6536: yadidaṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ saṃpatterāhātitrakaṃ copādāya mokṣāhāritrakamupādāya //
S04bsu034_u:6560: yadidaṃ sarvākuśaladharmaprahāṇāya ca saṃvartate sarvakuśaladharmāhāraṇatāyai ca sarvasattvamokṣāharaṇatāyai saṃvartate //
S04bsu034_u:6567: ....sahadharmeṇa tīrthikānāṃ nigrahaḥ? yadidaṃ sahadharmeṇa tīrthikānāṃ nigrahamupādāya //
S04bsu034_u:6590: .... abhijñā vikurvitukāmānām? yadidaṃ anāvaraṇatāmupādāya kāmanīyadharmatāṃ copādāya //
S04bsu034_u:6610: iti sarvadharmānutpādyatāmupādāya? ayameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ padaśatānāṃ nirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:6611: ayaṃ sa ucyate kumāra sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcito nāma samādhiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:6615: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:6616: SRS_40.1 vipulā buddhadharmā hi vipulo deśito nayaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:6620: SRS_40.3 vipulā cari sattvānāṃ vipulā teṣu deśitā /
S04bsu034_u:6622: asmin khalu punaḥ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitasamādhinirdeśe dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe aprameyaiḥ sattvairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni,
S04bsu034_u:6626: ayaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍavikāraṃ kampitaḥ prakampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:6644: sulabdhā lābhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ya imaṃ mahākaruṇāvatāradharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu034_u:6645: bahubuddhaparyupāsitāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitasamādhiṃ punaḥ punaḥ śroṣyanti,
S04bsu034_u:6646: śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayiṣyanti,
S04bsu034_u:6650: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - udgṛhvīṣva tvamānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi,
S04bsu034_u:6652: atha khalvāyuṣmānānado bhagavantametadavocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
S04bsu034_u:6654: bhagavānāha - mahākaruṇāvatāro nāmānanda idaṃ sūtraṃ dhāraya /
S04bsu034_u:6656: ānanda āha - udgṛhīto me bhagavannayaṃ dharmaparyāya iti //
S04bsu034_u:6658_0: āttamanāścandraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ tāścatasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ
S04bsu034_u:6658_1: aneke ca śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato
S04bsu034_u:6659: ityāryasarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitāt samādheryathālabdhaṃ samādhirājaṃ nāma mahāyānasūtraṃ parivarto nāma catvāriṃśatitamaṃ samāptam // 40 //
